JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Are you looking for more than a job? At World Vision Canada we offer challenging careers that change the lives of children all over the world and it will change yours too. Come and be part of a team of over 500 Canadians with a vision for the world: Life in all its fullness for every child.
', '
You will experience Christian faith in action helping to make real and lasting change in the lives of the world’s most vulnerable children. Join the World Vision Canada team and be part of a powerful and effective force for good:
', '
For Children. For Change. For Life.
', '
World Vision Canada is establishing a Market-Creating Innovation Incubator to focus on ideating and exploring innovative ideas through a disciplined approach to create new products and new markets that are delivered through optimal channels. Through ongoing and rapid ideation, exploration, solution development, prototyping, testing, validation, and refinement, this multidisciplinary team will produce new models to diversify sources for donation funds and further strengthening existing market offerings. This lean team will additionally explore, test and refine new and efficient methods of working that can be applied to the broader organization for increased efficiency as we shift to working in a more digital atmosphere.
', '
', 'We are looking for high performing individuals who are:', '
', '
', 'Agile and innovative individuals, who are able to manage in an environment of change and ambiguity to help us take bold and strategic moves in this rapidly evolving environment', '
', 'Creative thinkers who take initiative and are capable of building, launching and managing projects/programs that drive results for our customers', '
', 'Problem solvers with the ability to analyze and prioritize to meet business objectives', '
', 'Collaborative team players with superior influencing skills, who build relationships easily across various stakeholder groups to move initiatives forward', '
', '
If you’re curious, ready to take on new challenges and open to doing things differently to help us evolve rapidly, then World Vision Canada is definitely the place to be.
', 'As part of the Market-Creating Innovation team, World Vision Canada is looking for a highly detail-oriented, resourceful, and organized individual with a strong drive and exceptional problem-solving skills for the position of Business Analyst.
', '
Job Description
', '
Reporting to the Senior Director, Market-Creating Innovation and Enterprise Initiatives, the individual will:
', '
', '
', 'Supporting the creation of new and compelling solutions to make a meaningful impact while co-creating with other team members a fast-moving innovation team to diversify sources for donation funds and further strengthen market engagement.', '
', 'Creating and managing detailed action/project plans and assessing the impact on timelines and budget for change in scope or pivot in direction.', '
', 'Scoping initiatives and providing high-level and low-level estimates of the level of effort, time, people, cost, and compliance requirements.', '
', 'Creating, refining and maintaining detailed requirements and user stories and associated deliverables such as process flows and test cases for business, technical, and creative teams to execute against.', '
', 'Capturing, documenting, tracking, and prioritizing defects/bugs for resolution.', '
', 'Creating and keeping current documentation for all initiatives and manage the storage and indexing of documentation in a manner that is efficient and intuitive for all team members.', '
', 'Assisting with evaluating ideas (high-level and low-level evaluations) to understand the opportunity, financials, competitive landscape, addressable market, market viability, expected growth/scale, the effort required (people, time, cost, other requirements).', '
', 'Operating with a portfolio management approach to consistently monitor, compare, prioritize an innovation portfolio to ensure resources are deployed on best opportunities.', '
', 'Track the various initiatives in the innovation portfolio through defined stages and regularly report on pacing and progress in an efficient and intuitive way.', '
', 'Facilitate team progress reviews and decision-making meetings.', '
', 'Working closely and collaboratively with the other team members of the Market-Creating Innovation Incubator and external partners.', '
', 'Managing relationships and performance of third-party technical and creative partners.', '
', 'Research and analytics work on an ad-hoc basis.', '
', '
Qualifications
', '
', '
', 'A minimum of 5 years of experience as a business analyst, project manager, or product owner.', '
', 'A university degree in business, engineering, strategy, science, or a similar discipline.', '
', 'Experience in a start-up or agile environment.', '
', 'Experience scoping initiatives and providing high-level and low-level estimates of the level of effort, time, people, cost, and compliance requirements.', '
', 'Experience drafting detailed requirements for use by business, technical, and creative teams to execute against.', '
', 'Experience creating and managing detailed action/project plans and assessing impact to timelines and budget for change in scope or pivot in direction.', '
', 'Experience working with third-party technical and/or creative teams is preferred.', '
', 'Knowledge and experience in developing minimally viable products and conducting market testing.', '
', 'Strong planning and organizational skills, ability to prioritize, meet time commitments', '
', 'Strong analytical and research skills.', '
', 'Strong collaboration and problem-solving skills.', '
', 'Strong activity planning/project management skills.', '
', 'Ability to manage budgets, ROIs, resource allocation and multiple concurrent projects.', '
', 'Emotional intelligence, strong communication skills, and professionalism', '
', 'Ability to create and communicate clarity and structure from ambiguous problems.', '
', 'Understanding of international development and charitable space is an asset.', '
', 'Experience working with a task management software is an asset (I.e. Smartsheet, Monday.com, Wrike, Airtable)', '
', '
This posting will remain open until the position is filled.
', '
We bring life-saving support in times of disaster. We help poor communities to take charge of their futures. We provide small loans and training that boost family livelihoods. We work with policy makers to change the way the world is run. Our Christian faith teaches us that every child, regardless of gender, faith or race, is a precious gift to the entire world - and that their wellbeing concerns us all. We shall never rest while children suffer in situations that can be changed.
', "
Canada's Top 100 GTA's Top 10
", 'Our Core Values:', ' We are committed to the Poor. We are Christian. We are Stewards. We value People. We are Partners. We are Responsive.
', '
Qualified candidates must be able to demonstrate a commitment to the core values and mission of the World Vision partnership.
', 'World Vision Canada takes our Safeguarding responsibilities seriously and we provide an environment that is safe for our child and adult beneficiaries. We have strong recruitment procedures to make sure the safest and most suitable people work with the children in our programs. We provide our staff and volunteers with ongoing supervision, support and training in their work with child and adult beneficiaries.
', '
World Vision Canada welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.
', '
Thank you for your interest; however only those applicants selected for an interview will be contacted.']

', '
World Vision Canada is establishing a Market-Creating Innovation Incubator to focus on ideating and exploring innovative ideas through a disciplined approach to create new products and new markets that are delivered through optimal channels. Through ongoing and rapid ideation, exploration, solution development, prototyping, testing, validation, and refinement, this multidisciplinary team will produce new models to diversify sources for donation funds and further strengthening existing market offerings. This lean team will additionally explore, test and refine new and efficient methods of working that can be applied to the broader organization for increased efficiency as we shift to working in a more digital atmosphere.
', '
', 'We are looking for high performing individuals who are:', '
', '
', 'Agile and innovative individuals, who are able to manage in an environment of change and ambiguity to help us take bold and strategic moves in this rapidly evolving environment', '
', 'Creative thinkers who take initiative and are capable of building, launching and managing projects/programs that drive results for our customers', '
', 'Problem solvers with the ability to analyze and prioritize to meet business objectives', '
', 'Collaborative team players with superior influencing skills, who build relationships easily across various stakeholder groups to move initiatives forward', '
', '
If you’re curious, ready to take on new challenges and open to doing things differently to help us evolve rapidly, then World Vision Canada is definitely the place to be.
', 'As part of the Market-Creating Innovation team, World Vision Canada is looking for a highly detail-oriented, resourceful, and organized individual with a strong drive and exceptional problem-solving skills for the position of Business Analyst.
', '
Job Description
', '
Reporting to the Senior Director, Market-Creating Innovation and Enterprise Initiatives, the individual will:
', '
', '
', 'Supporting the creation of new and compelling solutions to make a meaningful impact while co-creating with other team members a fast-moving innovation team to diversify sources for donation funds and further strengthen market engagement.', '
', 'Creating and managing detailed action/project plans and assessing the impact on timelines and budget for change in scope or pivot in direction.', '
', 'Scoping initiatives and providing high-level and low-level estimates of the level of effort, time, people, cost, and compliance requirements.', '
', 'Creating, refining and maintaining detailed requirements and user stories and associated deliverables such as process flows and test cases for business, technical, and creative teams to execute against.', '
', 'Capturing, documenting, tracking, and prioritizing defects/bugs for resolution.', '
', 'Creating and keeping current documentation for all initiatives and manage the storage and indexing of documentation in a manner that is efficient and intuitive for all team members.', '
', 'Assisting with evaluating ideas (high-level and low-level evaluations) to understand the opportunity, financials, competitive landscape, addressable market, market viability, expected growth/scale, the effort required (people, time, cost, other requirements).', '
', 'Operating with a portfolio management approach to consistently monitor, compare, prioritize an innovation portfolio to ensure resources are deployed on best opportunities.', '
', 'Track the various initiatives in the innovation portfolio through defined stages and regularly report on pacing and progress in an efficient and intuitive way.', '
', 'Facilitate team progress reviews and decision-making meetings.', '
', 'Working closely and collaboratively with the other team members of the Market-Creating Innovation Incubator and external partners.', '
', 'Managing relationships and performance of third-party technical and creative partners.', '
', 'Research and analytics work on an ad-hoc basis.', '
', '
Qualifications
', '
', '
', 'A minimum of 5 years of experience as a business analyst, project manager, or product owner.', '
', 'A university degree in business, engineering, strategy, science, or a similar discipline.', '
', 'Experience in a start-up or agile environment.', '
', 'Experience scoping initiatives and providing high-level and low-level estimates of the level of effort, time, people, cost, and compliance requirements.', '
', 'Experience drafting detailed requirements for use by business, technical, and creative teams to execute against.', '
', 'Experience creating and managing detailed action/project plans and assessing impact to timelines and budget for change in scope or pivot in direction.', '
', 'Experience working with third-party technical and/or creative teams is preferred.', '
', 'Knowledge and experience in developing minimally viable products and conducting market testing.', '
', 'Strong planning and organizational skills, ability to prioritize, meet time commitments', '
', 'Strong analytical and research skills.', '
', 'Strong collaboration and problem-solving skills.', '
', 'Strong activity planning/project management skills.', '
', 'Ability to manage budgets, ROIs, resource allocation and multiple concurrent projects.', '
', 'Emotional intelligence, strong communication skills, and professionalism', '
', 'Ability to create and communicate clarity and structure from ambiguous problems.', '
', 'Understanding of international development and charitable space is an asset.', '
', 'Experience working with a task management software is an asset (I.e. Smartsheet, Monday.com, Wrike, Airtable)', '
', '
This posting will remain open until the position is filled.
', '
We bring life-saving support in times of disaster. We help poor communities to take charge of their futures. We provide small loans and training that boost family livelihoods. We work with policy makers to change the way the world is run. Our Christian faith teaches us that every child, regardless of gender, faith or race, is a precious gift to the entire world - and that their wellbeing concerns us all. We shall never rest while children suffer in situations that can be changed.
', "
Canada's Top 100 GTA's Top 10
", 'Our Core Values:', ' We are committed to the Poor. We are Christian. We are Stewards. We value People. We are Partners. We are Responsive.
', '
Qualified candidates must be able to demonstrate a commitment to the core values and mission of the World Vision partnership.
', 'World Vision Canada takes our Safeguarding responsibilities seriously and we provide an environment that is safe for our child and adult beneficiaries. We have strong recruitment procedures to make sure the safest and most suitable people work with the children in our programs. We provide our staff and volunteers with ongoing supervision, support and training in their work with child and adult beneficiaries.
', '
World Vision Canada welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.
', '
Thank you for your interest; however only those applicants selected for an interview will be contacted

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Interested in being a part of a team that is leading the evolution of retail in Canada?', '
', '
', 'Embracing and driving change is critical to our success. The complexity and rate at which the retail industry is transforming has increased exponentially in recent years and we are committed to being a leader in the industry. As such we are relentlessly focused on innovating at every level of our business, investing in new technologies and products, and doubling down on the best talent to drive the company forward. It is an especially exciting time to join the Canadian Tire Family of Companies.', '
', '
', 'The Business Analyst is responsible for analyzing data to indicate trends and identify issues to increase operations outputs and increase efficiencies. This position will provide you with the opportunity to apply your expert analytical skills using industry standard tools to conduct various levels and areas of analyses. You will be a key member of our very select Project team working on large strategic initiatives, as well as continuous improvement initiatives across all Canadian Tire Supply Chain banners. You will have the opportunity to learn and develop your knowledge and skills in several areas including Project and Change Management planning and implementation.', '
', '
', 'What you’ll do
', 'Use industry standard analytical tools to research, manage and mine data, to identify trends and potential issues and make recommendations
', 'Create templates, reports and other documents to capture and track project deliverables
', 'Identify and confirm business requirements and outcomes of analyses
', 'Create and support the creation of process development
', 'Identify and prioritize areas of the business/ process that can benefit from analyses execution
', 'Determine level of analyses required for a particular area and create a project plan
', 'Design professional presentations and present proposals
', 'Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders and business partners to build effective relationships to gain skills and knowledge about the operations.
', 'Apply standard Project Management tools and techniques to identify, plan and monitor deliverables.
', 'Apply standard Change Management theories and principals
', 'Keep abreast of industry trends and technology.
', 'Who you are', '
', '
', 'We are looking for high performing individuals who are:
', 'Highly motivated and a self-starter
', 'Agile and innovative individuals, who are able to manage in an environment of change and ambiguity to help us take bold and strategic moves in this rapidly evolving retail environment
', 'Creative and critical thinkers who take initiative and are capable of building, launching and managing plans to drive results for our customers
', 'Problem solvers with the ability to analyze and prioritize to meet business objectives
', 'Collaborative team players with superior influencing skills, who build relationships easily across various stakeholder groups to move initiatives forward
', 'Highly skilled in written and verbal communication with advance consulting skills
', 'Highly skilled in Microsoft office applications and able to develop powerful presentations and proposals
', 'Relentless learners who consistently develop their skills to continuously improve
', 'If you’re curious, ready to take on new challenges and open to doing things differently to help us evolve rapidly, then Canadian Tire is definitely the place to be.', '
', '
', 'What you’ve done
', 'Degree in business administration or equivalent.
', '2-4 years in a business analyst role
', 'Advance level user of Microsoft Excel and Access as well as other Microsoft applications
', 'Significant experience in designing and presenting PowerPoint presentations and proposals
', 'Proven ability to perform at a high level in a very fast pace environment
', 'Working experience on large process and system change projects
', 'Experience working with and understanding business process and identifying and analyzing gaps between current and future state
', 'Demonstrated experience working in a team environment with several cross functional stakeholders, building rapport and relationships
', 'Applied Project and Change management best practices
', 'Demonstrated ability to manage multiple conflicting priorities in a large dynamic environment
', 'Proven verbal and written communication skills
', 'Why us', '
', '
', 'Canadian Tire is one of Canada’s most iconic and diversified companies. Our culture and values uphold our pledge to sustainable practices, and commitment to our local communities through Jumpstart cannot be beat.', '
', '
', 'To learn more about this team and the Canadian Tire Family of Companies follow us on LinkedIn.', '
 ', '
', 'Canadian Tire Supply Chain
', 'Ontario-Brampton
', 'Permanent
', 'Full-time
', 'Job Posting
 ', ': Mar 4, 2020, 10:14:56 AM']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Are you someone who is passionate about making a difference? Are you a detail-oriented individual looking for an opportunity to work close to home?', '
', '
', '
With a role at Swish, you will have the opportunity to create better outcomes for clean, safe, healthy and productive work and living spaces. We have a current opening for a ', 'Business Analyst', ', working out of our Whitby location. The hours of work are Monday - Friday 9am - 5pm.', '
', '
', '
As the Business Analyst, your primary responsibility will be to provide relevant data that will assist Managers to maximize and enhance the profitability of the business. You will do this through analyzing sales and retail profitability for each of our retail stores (Clean-It Centres) and customer accounts. You will be develop and maintain key performance indicators including sales performance and growth, trend analysis, forecasting, regression, return on investment, and cost of sales.', '
', '
', '
Who are you?', '
', '
You are comfortable wearing many hats. This role will focus on the data analysis and reporting of customer accounts, retail locations, product lines and product offerings. The ability to prioritize and switch from one task to another will be part of your daily routine.', '
', '
', '
Attention to detail. You will need to be very detailed orientated to perform various analysis in an efficient manner while ensuring accuracy. You are highly proficient with Microsoft Excel and have experience with Business Analytics tools. If you have experience with Power BI it would be a definite asset.', '
', '
', '
Eager to learn! Although you will not be expected to learn about all or products, a general understanding of the array of products and services would be very helpful.', '
', '
', '
Enjoy helping others. You will be working with many of the departments in the organization including sales representatives, sales managers, senior members of the leadership team, purchasing departments and various vendors. You are comfortable interacting with various stakeholders and enjoy collaborating with others.', '
', '
', '
If you are looking for a challenge and enjoy seeing the tangible results of your work, then we want to hear from you!', '
', '
', '
We are an equal opportunity employer with the ability to earn above average compensation, excellent benefits package as well as opportunities for growth and personal development.', '
', "
Swish Maintenance Limited is committed to providing accessible employment practices that are in compliance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disability Act ('AODA'). Should any applicant require accommodations through the recruitment and selection process, please inform Human Resources", '.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['ABOUT US', "
Aecon Construction Group Inc. is the largest publicly traded construction and infrastructure development company in Canada. Aecon’s expertise covers the full range of services, including design and construction, financing, operating, procurement, and project management. Aecon Group and its predecessor companies have helped build many of Canada's most famous infrastructure landmarks, including the CN Tower, St. Lawrence Seaway, Highway 407 Express Toll Route, Vancouver Sky Train, and the Montreal-Trudeau International Airport, among others.", '
 ', 'DIVISIONAL OVERVIEW', 'Aecon’s Corporate division provides a support system which extends throughout all branches of the company and includes IT services, communications, finance and human resources, among others.', '
', '
POSITION OVERVIEW', '
This position involves the research, evaluation, and project management of process and/or system improvements within the Strategic Business Development team. This position will focus on initiatives relating to SBD’s CRM, database, reporting, and content management needs. Projects will also involve input and criteria requirements from a variety of key BD stakeholders from across Aecon’s business units, ensuring that the systems developed within SBD can have broader adoption and applicability to business development groups.', '
', '
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Manage assigned initiatives including:', '
 o Collecting stakeholder recommendations/requirements and assessing their compatibility with existing systems or feasibility to implement within planned projects.', '
 o Documenting detailed requirements and scopes of work regarding projects involving technology vendors or internal clients', '
', 'Business Intelligence: Supporting our BI activities including', '
 o Updating or creating dashboards/visualizations/reports in BI tools such as Power BI, SAP Analytics Cloud and/or Excel. Knowledge of additional platforms is an advantage.', '
 o Querying various database systems and creating new data models (advantage)', '
 o Creating and maintain reports and conducting analysis to ensure data quality', '
', 'Systems Management & Improvements:', '
 o Supporting our SharePoint sites by identifying and implementing improvements (automated workflows, new apps, etc.).
 ', '
o Managing user access to key systems as well as establish controls (fields or features enabled by user group). Logging tickets with vendor in support of BD end users and working with the vendor to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.', '
', 'OTHER DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', '
', 'Additional duties may include the following:', '
', 'Researching marketing information and updating our entries in our databases (manually or via SQL scripts)', 'Occasionally supporting colleagues to address SharePoint access control issues and other common user driven issues', 'Create applications for MS Office (custom programs on Office Ribbon) or SharePoint using VBA, JS or other applicable programming languages (nice to have)', 'Limited travel across Canada', '
', '
REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS', ' • Education: college or university training in computer science, programming or related field
', '
', 'High degree of organizational and project management skills with an ability to multitask
', 'Team player able to work with a range of people and skills
', 'Strong verbal and written communication
', 'Eager to learn a broad range of topics with a hands-on approach
', 'Adaptable and willingness to work on a variety of initiatives from small to mid-sized projects
', 'Knowledge in Power Query, VBA', 'Knowledge in SQL, DAX/M, Python or other programming languages (strong advantage)', '
', '
COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS OVERVIEW', 'Aecon offers the opportunity to work on challenging, high profile projects and provides competitive compensation and benefits.', ' ', 'EQUITY STATEMENT', 'Aecon is an equal opportunity employer.', ' ', 'ACCESSIBILITY STATEMENT', 'Aecon accommodates. Upon request, Aecon accommodates candidates with disabilities throughout the hiring process.', ' ', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'Interested candidates may apply directly through our Careers Website under "View Jobs":', ' ', 'www.aecon.com/Careers/View_Jobs', '#LI- 127615536_LB1']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['IKO Industries Ltd. ', 'is a market leader in the manufacturing of roofing and building materials. IKO is a Canadian owned and operated business with production facilities worldwide and has many years of unparalleled success in the roofing materials industry. Quality, integrity, and trustworthiness are the values that underlie this success, and we have built this company by hiring people who hold these values. People like you!', '
', '
', 'Job Description
', 'Job Description
', '
', '
As a Digital Business Analyst, you will be encouraged to continue to develop your skills, share your knowledge with team members and peers and effectively lead a project stream on a project.
', '
', '
This position requires a focus on client success, client-facing skills and a strong understanding of the project life cycle and software development life cycle.
', 'You must bring leadership, analytical thinking, and be an inherent curiosity to the role. The successful candidate would be detail oriented with the ability and eagerness to learn and understand business, customer and technology needs. You are a creative thinker with excellent verbal and written communication skills and embrace detail but summarize and express it clearly and accurately.
', '
', '
We are looking for fun, intelligent, team-oriented people who want to work in an agile environment and believe in our values: Long Term, Performance, Humility, Sharing Knowledge, Integrity and Agility.
', 'Key Responsibilities:
', '1) Take responsibility in becoming a bridge between business and IT project team, and work closely with various business departments to collect business requirement, refine and document them in the format of user story
', '2) Own Product Backlog and maintain it in a good prioritized shape with clearly defined top product backlog items to support Sprint planning, Sprint Execution and Product Demo
', '3) Own and communicate product vision and roadmap to all parties
', '4) Daily collaborate with stakeholders to collect and prioritize requirements, and update the product roadmap considering development team’s capacity
', '5) Daily support development team with resolving questions and issues about product requirements, and providing feedback about deliverable
', '6) Conduct user validation, feasibility analysis and cost analysis for the product
', '7) Proactively seek out issues that could negatively impact the product release schedule, and initiate the corrective actions to resolve and escalate the matter to meet the schedule
', 'Qualifications:
', '3 years of experience in software development using Agile frameworks, and minimum 1 year’ experience with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software-preferably Salesforce.com and Salesforce Communities
', 'Thorough understanding of software product development lifecycle
', 'Previous experience in implementing MobileFirst application and SaaS solution is preferred
', 'Proficiency with JIRA, & Trello
', 'Scrum Product Owner certification is a plus
', 'Strong analytical skills with developing new reporting analytics
', 'Experienced with SDLC methodology run projects from Requirement Gathering, Design, Testing, Documentation Training through Implementation
', 'Successful delivery of Ecommerce, Digital Marketing and CRM projects
', 'Client-facing / Customer-facing experience to deliver solution overviews, webinars and training
', 'Ability to communicate, produce documentation, prepare and lead client sessions, etc.
', 'Strong ability to navigate ambiguity, overcome confusion and simplify complex situations
', 'Solid presentation, facilitation, interview and workshop facilitation skills
', 'Solid communication skills with ability and experience working with executive level staff
', 'University degree is required
', 'Additional Skills:
', 'Previous experience in a Product Owner capacity
', 'Ability to present complex information clearly and concisely to different levels of the organization (written and verbal – i.e. PowerPoint)
', 'Business process flows and modelling
', 'Design thinking skills
', 'Analytical and critical thinking skills
', 'Understanding of digital technologies (e.g. HTML, CSS, SaaS platform architecture, RESTful services)
', 'Working experience with a leading Ecommerce and Integration platform(s) including but not limited to
', 'Salesforce
', 'WordPress
', 'Oracle Fusion Middleware
', 'Exposed to or directly used ECM, or Web CMS
', 'Integration Frameworks (SOAP, REST, JSON)
', 'XML/XML Schema and experience with Data Modeling
', 'UI/UX Design Principles
', 'SharePoint experience is an asset
', 'Basic knowledge of CSS/HTML/Javascript
', 'Benefits of Employment: ', "IKO recognizes that its success is due to the strength of its employees. A primary goal of IKO is to promote individual employee's sense of accomplishment and contribution so that employees enjoy their association with IKO. The Company invests in its employees so that they are the most knowledgeable in the industry, and undertakes great efforts to nurture loyalty to, and teamwork at, IKO. We are pleased to offer competitive compensation, health care, a progressive and challenging workplace and a commitment to teamwork and integrity.", '
', '
', 'Diversity and Equal Opportunity Employment: ', 'IKO Industries Ltd. is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to diversity and inclusion and are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without consideration to race, religion, creed, color, national origin, age, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status or disability. IKO Industries Ltd. encourages and welcomes applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.']

', '
', '
This position requires a focus on client success, client-facing skills and a strong understanding of the project life cycle and software development life cycle.
', 'You must bring leadership, analytical thinking, and be an inherent curiosity to the role. The successful candidate would be detail oriented with the ability and eagerness to learn and understand business, customer and technology needs. You are a creative thinker with excellent verbal and written communication skills and embrace detail but summarize and express it clearly and accurately.
', '
', '
We are looking for fun, intelligent, team-oriented people who want to work in an agile environment and believe in our values: Long Term, Performance, Humility, Sharing Knowledge, Integrity and Agility.
', 'Key Responsibilities:
', '1) Take responsibility in becoming a bridge between business and IT project team, and work closely with various business departments to collect business requirement, refine and document them in the format of user story
', '2) Own Product Backlog and maintain it in a good prioritized shape with clearly defined top product backlog items to support Sprint planning, Sprint Execution and Product Demo
', '3) Own and communicate product vision and roadmap to all parties
', '4) Daily collaborate with stakeholders to collect and prioritize requirements, and update the product roadmap considering development team’s capacity
', '5) Daily support development team with resolving questions and issues about product requirements, and providing feedback about deliverable
', '6) Conduct user validation, feasibility analysis and cost analysis for the product
', '7) Proactively seek out issues that could negatively impact the product release schedule, and initiate the corrective actions to resolve and escalate the matter to meet the schedule
', 'Qualifications:
', '3 years of experience in software development using Agile frameworks, and minimum 1 year’ experience with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software-preferably Salesforce.com and Salesforce Communities
', 'Thorough understanding of software product development lifecycle
', 'Previous experience in implementing MobileFirst application and SaaS solution is preferred
', 'Proficiency with JIRA, & Trello
', 'Scrum Product Owner certification is a plus
', 'Strong analytical skills with developing new reporting analytics
', 'Experienced with SDLC methodology run projects from Requirement Gathering, Design, Testing, Documentation Training through Implementation
', 'Successful delivery of Ecommerce, Digital Marketing and CRM projects
', 'Client-facing / Customer-facing experience to deliver solution overviews, webinars and training
', 'Ability to communicate, produce documentation, prepare and lead client sessions, etc.
', 'Strong ability to navigate ambiguity, overcome confusion and simplify complex situations
', 'Solid presentation, facilitation, interview and workshop facilitation skills
', 'Solid communication skills with ability and experience working with executive level staff
', 'University degree is required
', 'Additional Skills:
', 'Previous experience in a Product Owner capacity
', 'Ability to present complex information clearly and concisely to different levels of the organization (written and verbal – i.e. PowerPoint)
', 'Business process flows and modelling
', 'Design thinking skills
', 'Analytical and critical thinking skills
', 'Understanding of digital technologies (e.g. HTML, CSS, SaaS platform architecture, RESTful services)
', 'Working experience with a leading Ecommerce and Integration platform(s) including but not limited to
', 'Salesforce
', 'WordPress
', 'Oracle Fusion Middleware
', 'Exposed to or directly used ECM, or Web CMS
', 'Integration Frameworks (SOAP, REST, JSON)
', 'XML/XML Schema and experience with Data Modeling
', 'UI/UX Design Principles
', 'SharePoint experience is an asset
', 'Basic knowledge of CSS/HTML/Javascript
', 'Benefits of Employment: ', "IKO recognizes that its success is due to the strength of its employees. A primary goal of IKO is to promote individual employee's sense of accomplishment and contribution so that employees enjoy their association with IKO. The Company invests in its employees so that they are the most knowledgeable in the industry, and undertakes great efforts to nurture loyalty to, and teamwork at, IKO. We are pleased to offer competitive compensation, health care, a progressive and challenging workplace and a commitment to teamwork and integrity.", '
', '
', 'Diversity and Equal Opportunity Employment: ', 'IKO Industries Ltd. is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to diversity and inclusion and are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without consideration to race, religion, creed, color, national origin, age, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status or disability. IKO Industries Ltd. encourages and welcomes applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Teranet provides business-to-government (B2G) and business-to-business (B2B) service solutions that enable organizations to greatly enhance the services they provide to their customers. With a unique combination of capabilities and state-of the-art systems, Teranet is at the forefront of delivering service potential in the land, legal and financial services industries as well as enabling electronic government service delivery.
', 'We are seeking a Business Analyst who will act as a bridge between our internal business objectives and those of our partners, in order to optimize our business processes and our information technology capacity, ensuring that the solution delivered meets the business need.
', 'Overview:
', 'The Business Analyst plays a key role in the entire Requirements process. Employing various techniques, he/she elicits business requirements from all stakeholder groups, analyzing them for areas of alignment and divergence. The Business Analyst must further probe and understand the source of any areas of stakeholder divergence or disagreement and seek to close the gap and achieve alignment among key stakeholders.
', 'Responsibilities:
', 'Elicit requirements using a variety of techniques, such as interviews, focus groups, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, scenarios, business analysis, task and workflow analysis.
', 'Maintaining a user focus, critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs.
', 'Work closely with development teams, participate in stand-up meetings, manage defect triage and prioritize backlog
', 'Use judgment, product and business knowledge to help stakeholders to shape business requirements for the best solution outcome.
', 'Develop requirements specifications according to standard templates under the Governance Framework, using natural language and requirements modeling software (e.g. Blueprint).
', 'Present requirements model and solution proposals from development team to stakeholders to gain stakeholder buy-in and support for the solution.
', 'Validate the solution by collaborating with developers and subject matter experts to successfully bridge the solution’s business requirements to its technical vision.
', 'Be the liaison between the Product Manager, the business partners, the development and QA teams, to ensure product and service delivery is timely and cost effective, that the product meets service level standards and provides high customer satisfaction.
', 'Partner closely with the development teams to ensure there is full understanding and proper execution of requirements
', 'Manage deliverables and timelines for own deliverables, negotiating with internal and external stakeholders to meet relevant project milestones.
', 'Manage changing requirements in conjunction with the Product Manager and communicate cascading changes to the all teams.
', 'Proactively communicate and collaborate with external and internal stakeholders to analyze information needs and functional requirements and deliver the following artifacts as needed: (Functional and Non-functional requirements, Business Requirements Document, Use Cases, User Stories, Story Mapping, Mock Ups).
', 'Proven ability and willingness to learn on the job.
', 'Contribute to internal and external stakeholders’ positive perception of ESR as a professional and effective unit of Teranet.
', 'Participation in User Acceptance Testing as needed.
', 'Review of Quality Assurance and Development artifacts to ensure alignment with business requirements.
', 'Qualifications:
', 'Minimum College Diploma or University degree.
', '5 years of related experience OR an equivalent combination of work experience and education.
', 'CBAP ® or similar certification, or business analysis coursework towards CBAP ® qualification, preferred.
', 'Some knowledge of the Software Development process.
', 'Prior experience in facilitation for the purpose of eliciting and documenting requirements.
', 'Knowledge of user experience principles and user centric design would be an asset.
', 'Experience with tools to capture and model requirements (e.g. Blueprint, Balsamiq, Visio) and manage software defects (JIRA, Quality Centre).
', 'Intermediate to advanced knowledge of MS Office tools.
', 'Strong analytical and organizational skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret stakeholder business needs and translate them into application and operational requirements.
', 'Strong facilitation and presentation skills.
', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group of internal and external executives, managers, and subject matter experts as needed.
', 'Good leadership skills and the ability to drive for results.
', 'Knowledge of the Ontario Land Registration System and legislative requirements as they relate to the ELRS products would be an asset.
', 'Previous experience in working with Government would be an asset.
', 'Previous experience in an agile/hybrid environment would be an asset.']

', 'Good leadership skills and the ability to drive for results.

', 'Previous experience in working with Government would be an asset.
', 'Previous experience in an agile/hybrid environment would be an asset

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Aerotek is a leading provider of professional and technical personnel services in North America, in partnership with leading companies and experts from all sectors.', '
Aerotek has currently job opportunities as Business Analyst for its client BOMBARDIER', '
', '
In your role, you will:', '
Create and maintain standard governance packages;', '
Analyze business reporting and perform root cause analysis;', '
Control customer facing action registers and implement solutions;', '
Participate in process improvement projects;', '
Lead and participate in presentations', '
Collaborate with small project teams;', '
Review detailed plans & metrics with senior management, as required;', '
Interact with different hierarchical levels of Bombardier Aerospace;', '
Prepare and lead communications based on the target audience;', '
', '
', '
As our ideal candidate,', '
You have a Bachelor degree', '
You have an excellent knowledge of French and English, written and spoken;', '
You have a good knowledge with MS Office (Project, Visio, Excel and PowerPoint);', '
You have excellent computer skills to operate word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, databases and, project management software.
', 'You have strong access database skills which is critical for you to assume responsibility of existing tools and create new tools judiciously', '
You have knowledge of SAP (asset)', '
You are a team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills', '
You have a strong work ethic and are willing to take initiative;', '
You know how to meet tight deadlines;', '
You are able to multi-task under a highly demanding and continuously changing environment;', '
You are able to work under pressure', '
You are flexible in your work hours', '
Some business travel will be required to support special project initiatives.', '
', '
', '
', "À propos d'Aerotek:", '
', '
', '
', "Notre monde nous tient à cœur. Reconnu Best of StaffingMD par nos clients et le talent que nous recrutons, AerotekMD Inc. se distingue comme chef de file du recrutement et en de la dotation de personnel grâce à sa grande compréhension des liens entre le talent et les affaires. Étant donné qu'Aerotek est un partenaire stratégique de plus de 18 000 clients et 300 000 employés contractuels chaque année, son approche axée sur les gens lui permet d'offrir un avantage concurrentiel à ses clients et des emplois gratifiants à ses employés contractuels. Aerotek, dont le siège social est à Hanover, au Maryland, exploite un réseau de plus de 250 bureaux non franchisés, comptant plus de 8 000 employés internes dévoués à servir nos clients. Aerotek est une société en exploitation d'Allegis Group, un fournisseur multinational de solutions en matière de talent. Pour en savoir davantage, consultez le site aerotek.com/fr-ca."]

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Location:
', '1 Presidents Choice Circle, Brampton, Ontario, L6Y 5S5
', 'The decision to join a company is a big one. We have opportunities for hard working, energetic and reliable people just like you.
', 'Why is this role important?
', 'We are hiring a Senior Business Analyst
', '
Reporting directly to the Business Engagement Manager, the incumbent works with the appropriate business units to create business requirements and support business case development. The incumbent applies Supply Chain Systems domain knowledge as well as the various stages of the IT project life cycle including Requirements Gathering, Design Review, Test Planning and Review, Implementation Planning, Deployment Support (during and post-implementation).
', 'Duties:
', 'Liaises with appropriate departments to create in-depth, complex, business case documentation.
', 'Analyzes technical and functional impacts of various candidate solutions and approaches to respond to needs and provide recommendations to business units.
', 'Supports the creation of User Acceptance Testing documentation.
', 'Monitors and supports new releases, including e-mail communication, to respond to feedback and resolve issues. Liaises with relevant stakeholders such as Delivery, Architecture, Operations and the Support Desk as required.
', 'Interfaces with third party vendors to support the timely delivery and high quality of services to the business.
', 'Provides support and information as required to assist in the timely resolution of issues or problems.
', 'L ead discussions and gather inputs/ideas from multiple stakeholders and brings them together in a clear, concise and complete manner
', 'F acilitate large and complex workshops and meetings across multiple stakeholder groups
', 'Understand core functionality of all applications used by the Product family
', 'Address business / end-user inquiries related to the application
', 'Create business process maps (in line with internal business process standards)
', 'Define test scenarios and complete data prep activity
', 'Execute UAT on behalf of the business and validate results
', 'Manage requirements across lifecycle (identify conflicting requirements, prioritize by business impact, etc.) facilitate consensus of requirements across multiple stakeholders and conflicting inputs
', 'Technical proficiency (scripting, configuration) for applications they support (e.g. WMS, TMS, etc.)
', 'Skills
', 'This position requires a demonstrated level of initiative and judgment in order to organize and prioritize tasks, workload and projects. Courtesy, tact and diplomacy are required in dealing with colleagues in every day working relationships.
', 'Demonstrated understanding of Supply Chain applications, specifically Warehouse Management Systems and Transportation Management Systems. Knowledge of Manhattan, JDA application suites are an asset.
', 'Experience in leveraging project delivery methodologies including agile, waterfall, iterative
', 'Proficiency in the use of project management tools, i.e., Jira, Confluence is an asset
', 'Expertise in agile techniques, including Scrum, Kanban is a definite asset
', 'Proven experience in leveraging project delivery methodologies including waterfall, iterative, incremental and agile
', 'Requires an understanding of inter-related work processes to be able to adapt to differing assignments.
', 'Professional manner, tact, diplomacy and discretion in dealing with colleagues including senior management.
', 'Draws on a number of known options to solve problems and to develop improvements.
', 'Computer skills to produce effective, spreadsheets, reports, documents and presentations, as required.
', 'Adaptable to set and prioritize work with varying exceptions. Able to work with diverse personalities and styles.
', 'Communicates with clarity, verbally and in one on one or group situations, or over the telephone.
', 'Communicates well in writing by composing clear documents; facility with editing and/or proof-reading is required
', 'Education
', 'Post secondary education equivalent to a college diploma in Computer Science, Programming or equivalent.
', 'How You’ll Succeed:
', 'At Loblaw, we seek great people to continually strengthen our culture. We believe great people model our values, are authentic, build trust and make connections.
', 'If that sounds like you, and you are open-minded, responsive to change and up to the challenges provided in a fast-paced retail environment, apply today.
', 'In addition, we believe that compliance with laws is about doing the right thing. Upholding the law is part of our Code of Conduct – it reinforces what our customers and stakeholders expect of us.
', 'Employment Type:
', 'Full time
', 'Type of Role:
', 'Regular
', "Loblaw recognizes Canada's diversity as a source of national pride and strength. We have made it a priority to reflect our nation’s evolving diversity in the products we sell, the people we hire, and the culture we create in our organization. Accommodation is available upon request for applicants with disabilities in the recruitment and assessment process and when hired.
", 'Please Note: If you have Employee Self Service (ESS) on Workday, apply to this job via the Workday application.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Bonsai’s mission is to help people find and buy the products they want, as soon as they realize they want them. We began in 2016 as a streetwear style and news app. Now we’re leading the market shift to content-driven commerce. Bonsai is partnered with 30 of the world’s largest publishers and has integrated 1,200 brands. Our team is 35-strong, and we’ve raised $11M in venture capital.', '
Our technology allows users to transact natively while browsing content. We make the journey from seeing a product to buying it possible in two taps. Our vision is to make this possible everywhere you discover products. For publishers, we provide a powerful revenue alternative to ads that also improves the user experience. Bonsai allows merchants to capture customers while they browse content, right when purchasing intent is being formed.', '
At Bonsai, we pride ourselves on the transparent and performance-driven environment we’ve created for our team. We value making data driven-decisions and taking calculated risks that add value to our users.', '
We’re looking for our first Business Analyst to support our supply, core and demand teams and helping us to optimize our pipelines, pricing and provide in-depth research to our teams that will have a significant impact.', '
', '
The role (In a nutshell):', '
', 'Research and determine the best strategies for the business development team to hit acquisition targets.
', 'Help optimize our product offering by prioritizing the merchant acquisition pipeline.', '
', 'Help increase Bonsai’s margin by determining what margin our partners are operating on given their place in the supply chain and research into competitors.', '
', 'Analyze industry trends to create white papers for internal and external use.', '
', 'Conduct research into competitors in the market, creating internal resources in the form of decks, SWOTs, and research reports.', '
', 'Help increase deal flow and the speed with which we commercialize deals by recommending prioritized publishers to prospect.', '
', 'Create financial models to be used in discussions with prospective partners.', '
', 'Help research and inform Bonsai’s position on performance benchmarks and annual targets in discussions with publishers.', '
', 'Your background:', '
', 'You’ll have solid experience in one of these areas: business analysis, financial analysis, business intelligence, inventory analysis, merchandise analysis.', '
', 'It’s a plus but not necessary if you have a degree in economics, mathematics, business or finance.', '
', 'You’ll be analytical and can analyze research and data to make recommendations.', '
', 'Ideally, you’ll have a retail or eCommerce background.', '
', 'What to expect:', '
', 'Review - you’ll hear from us regardless', '
', 'Intro Call - a quick call with the Head of People to discuss the role and learn who you are!', '
', 'An interview with some of the team - 45 minutes to go over your background, the role and Bonsai. Also, an excellent time for you to ask any questions you have.', '
', 'Take-Home Assessment - a realistic problem to solve on your own time', '
', 'Onsite Interview - a 2-hour onsite interview to meet the team, and your chance to interview us.', '
', 'Offer - this is the part where we make the offer, you accept, and we all celebrate!', '
', 'At Bonsai, we are committed to building and fostering a diverse and inclusive environment where our employees feel valued, heard, and supported. It is our belief that a commitment to diversity, inclusion and belonging enables us to do the best work of our lives - building the future of content and commerce! We strongly encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experience, and perspectives regardless of race, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, age, citizenship, disability, and national origin.', '
Bonsai welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the hiring and selection process. If you require accommodations or have any questions, please email us at accessibility@shopbonsai.ca.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Overview:', '
We are currently looking for a ', 'Business Analyst - Insurance', ' in our Burlington, Ontario (CDN) office. This position reports directly to the Development Manager.', '
Responsibilities:', '
The purpose of this role is to:', '
', 'Utilize knowledge of software system(s) and business processes to identify requirements to implement, fix, and enhance technical solutions for clients', '
Translate business requirements into technical requirements for developers', '
', '
Key Duties and Responsibilities:', '
', '
Interpret the business needs and prioritize requirements of existing and new clients.', '
Translate business needs into the development requirements.', '
Identify and model business rules, processes and data requirements.', '
Analyse software problems and diagnose root causes.', '
Provide clear, concise, and helpful communications to clients.', '
Test and validate software systems.', '
Provide training to clients.', '
Stay abreast of the latest trends and compliance requirements in the insurance industry.', '
Qualifications:', '
Qualifications:', '
', '
Experienced Business Analyst with at least 3 years in a software application environment.', '
Experience with Agile and Waterfall methodologies.', '
Track record of delivering on your commitments.', '
Analytical, organized, detail-oriented and a good problem solver.', '
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.', '
Professional in manner and appearance.', '
Deal well with frequent changes.', '
Detailed business knowledge of the individual insurance industry, ideally the agent/commission/new business aspect', '
Belong in a smart, committed, fun-loving team', '
Experience as a software developer or tester is an asset.', '
French/English bilingual is an asset', '
About Us:', '
', 'iPipeline is a leading provider of cloud-based software solutions for the life insurance and financial services industry. Through our SaaS solutions, we accelerate and simplify insurance sales, compliance, operations, and support. We provide process automation and seamless integration between every participant in the life insurance industry including carriers, agents (such as financial advisors and independent insurance agents), distributors (such as banks, broker-dealers, and general agencies) and consumers. Our innovative solutions enable automated processing for pre-sales, point-of-sale execution of applications, post-sale support, reporting, consumer delivery and agency management.', '
', '
iPipeline makes it easier for people to purchase investment and insurance products that secure their financial future. With headquarters in Exton, Pennsylvania, iPipeline has locations in Cheltenham (UK), Burlington (ON), Fort Lauderdale, Ontario (CA), Philadelphia, and Salt Lake City. Visit www.ipipeline.com.', '
', '

CLUSTER JOB:
Overview:', '
We are currently looking for a ', 'Business Analyst - Insurance', ' in our Burlington, Ontario (CDN) office. This position reports directly to the Development Manager.', '
Responsibilities:', '
The purpose of this role is to:', '
', 'Utilize knowledge of software system(s) and business processes to identify requirements to implement, fix, and enhance technical solutions for clients', '
Translate business requirements into technical requirements for developers', '
', '
Key Duties and Responsibilities:', '
', '
Interpret the business needs and prioritize requirements of existing and new clients.', '
Translate business needs into the development requirements.', '
Identify and model business rules, processes and data requirements.', '
Analyse software problems and diagnose root causes.', '
Provide clear, concise, and helpful communications to clients.', '
Test and validate software systems.', '
Provide training to clients.', '
Stay abreast of the latest trends and compliance requirements in the insurance industry.', '
Qualifications:', '
Qualifications:', '
', '
Experienced Business Analyst with at least 3 years in a software application environment.', '
Experience with Agile and Waterfall methodologies.', '
Track record of delivering on your commitments.', '
Analytical, organized, detail-oriented and a good problem solver.', '
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.', '
Professional in manner and appearance.', '
Deal well with frequent changes.', '
Detailed business knowledge of the individual insurance industry, ideally the agent/commission/new business aspect', '
Belong in a smart, committed, fun-loving team', '
Experience as a software developer or tester is an asset.', '
French/English bilingual is an asset', '
About Us:', '
', 'iPipeline is a leading provider of cloud-based software solutions for the life insurance and financial services industry. Through our SaaS solutions, we accelerate and simplify insurance sales, compliance, operations, and support. We provide process automation and seamless integration between every participant in the life insurance industry including carriers, agents (such as financial advisors and independent insurance agents), distributors (such as banks, broker-dealers, and general agencies) and consumers. Our innovative solutions enable automated processing for pre-sales, point-of-sale execution of applications, post-sale support, reporting, consumer delivery and agency management.', '
', '
iPipeline makes it easier for people to purchase investment and insurance products that secure their financial future. With headquarters in Exton, Pennsylvania, iPipeline has locations in Cheltenham (UK), Burlington (ON), Fort Lauderdale, Ontario (CA), Philadelphia, and Salt Lake City. Visit www.ipipeline.com.', '
', '

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['This is your opportunity to join AXIS Capital – a trusted global provider of specialty lines insurance and reinsurance. We stand apart for our outstanding client service, intelligent risk taking and superior risk adjusted returns for our shareholders. We also proudly maintain an entrepreneurial, disciplined and ethical corporate culture. As a member of AXIS, you join a team that is among the best in the industry.
', 'Are you ready to get in on something new and exciting? Located in the beautiful Nova Center, AXIS Capital, a leader in the insurance and reinsurance industry, is implementing leading technologies and vendor products to drive enterprise change. This is an opportunity to effect real change and implement solutions that will set the stage for the future. Enjoy a friendly, exciting work environment with great benefits (Health and Dental Insurance, Wellness Programs, Retirement) while contributing to the future.
', 'The Workplace Productivity Center of Excellence IT Business Analyst is responsible for the support of projects and enhancements for associated applications. The Business Analyst elicits, defines, and documents the business and functional requirements. The Business Analyst validates functional business design documentation, reviews test plans, and verifies system functionality delivered for the project.
', 'Key Duties & Responsibilities:
', 'Lead the capture, review and update business requirements
', 'Produce deliverables based on IT Lead and SME guidance
', 'Capture business capability matrix, detailed requirements, user stories, business rules, etc.
', 'Communication and training materials as needed
', 'Support the delivery of the Business Architecture by partnering with stakeholders and functional lead(s) to identify business process issues and capability needs
', 'Liaise between technical and non-technical resource team members to answer day to day business questions either directly or indirectly as supported by the Business Leads and SMEs
', 'Conduct walkthroughs with project team members and business leads
', 'Understand and manage to scope of defined project
', 'Work with QA and Business SMEs (UAT) to ensure requirements traceability and coverage within test cases
', 'Promote change management principles with executives, senior leaders, managers and supervisors to influence, build relationships, and manage resistance
', 'Provide support during end user training, prior to production deployments
', 'Provide support to end users as needed
', 'Required Skills and Qualifications
', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business or Computer Science preferred
', '3-5 years’ experience as a business analysis preferred
', '3+ years’ experience in P&C Insurance industry including experience with insurance platforms
', '3+ years’ experience with Microsoft platforms including Microsoft Dynamics and SharePoint preferred
', 'Experience with Reinsurance is a plus
', 'Experience developing technical documentation including process documentation, storyboarding, business requirements, use cases and presentations
', 'Ability to communicate effectively and efficiently in person and remotely
', 'Dedicated and detail oriented
', 'Dedicated and conscientious team player
', 'Excellent Analytical skills']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Business Analyst ', 'About the client', 'The client is a global organization dedicated to putting information at the service of medicine. The companies and people of the Client Company aim to improve medical care by serving those who need it, those who provide it and those who seek to improve it.', 'Our primary purpose is to help clients increase the effectiveness of activities pertaining to scientific communication, medical education and product/service marketing. To this end, we want our information services to contribute to the goals we share with our clients, namely: to accelerate the advancement of medicine and help people enjoy better, longer lives.', 'Overall Objectives', 'Reporting to the Project Director, this role will be involved in developing and maintaining the roadmaps along with business partners and stakeholders from the business. The successful candidate would implement cloud based solutions involving cloud marketing tools and making sure that the tool is correctly deployed.', 'What you will do: ', 'Collect, document, and analyze workflows, as well as develop business process models in collaboration with multidisciplinary stakeholders.', 'Facilitate process design sessions to produce detailed process flows and associated documentation.', 'Interview system stakeholders and record and organize results, requirements, and recommendations.', 'Document current and future state business processes, define and document functional requirements, and conduct information flow analysis and process modeling within and across all disciplines and administrative components.', 'Analyze process gaps and information flow obstacles or system issues, and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Define user needs and business requirements for applications and systems.', 'Communicating with clients at a senior level.', 'Prepare and present related material to project teams, steering committees, and/or stakeholder organizations.', 'Analyze information to establish recommendations for improvements in system effectiveness and efficiency.', 'Who you are: ', "A bachelor's degree in computer science, computer systems engineering, software engineering, Information Management or Information Technology, Marketing or a related discipline.", '5 years of experience in formal methods for business analysis requirements gathering, modeling, and diagramming.', 'Experience working with Senior Management to understand their goals and being able to translate that into a technical document.', 'Experience with full SDLC building web applications.', 'Understanding and experience with different software development methodologies, including SCRUM/Agile.', 'The successful candidate will have the following competencies: Strong analytical skills, critical thinking, strong organization skills good collaboration skills, strong work ethic, initiative and the drive to succeed.', 'Experience with Adobe Marketing Cloud is a strong asset.', 'Superior Communications Skills. This position requires the candidate to be able to seamlessly, precisely, and unambiguously communicate with technical teams, project managers as well as senior business leadership - written and verbally.', 'Location: ', 'Downtown Montreal', 'Salary range: ', '$80-$90K (depending on experience and skills)', 'Job Types: Full-time, Permanent', 'Experience:', 'business analyst: 1 year (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['The Opportunity', 'SkyHive is looking for an enthusiastic ', 'Business Analyst (BA) ', 'to own the Discovery phase of engaging with Enterprise clients. The BA will solicit, understand, assess, and document the business requirements, processes and reporting needs. They will be required to partner effectively and professionally with all levels of an organization, and proactively identify opportunities, scope problems and co-create potential solutions with the customer. It is also crucial that the BA be skilled at connecting with various personalities, managing expectations (especially from detractors), and adapting stakeholders’ preferred project management methods to SkyHive’s agile philosophy and working style.', 'The Role', 'Lead the initial “discovery phase” with Enterprise-level stakeholders and other subject matter experts; preparation in the form of their search and acquisition of human capital', 'Provide expertise through performing gap analysis and understanding of business goals and needs, while applying relevant processes and practices and abiding by established KPIs', 'Use appropriate tools and techniques to elicit, define and analyze requirements', 'Gather critical information from formal meetings and workshops, produce useful minutes and reports, and contribute to data-driven business decisions', 'Build rapport and develop genuine relationships with customers and effectively communicate insights and plans to cross-functional team JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Job Summary
', 'The focus of this job is on producing high quality, detailed work based on established standards, guidelines and procedures. Job knowledge and competency is built through structured step-by-step training and positive, supportive coaching from management and peers. Communication with others is based on knowledge of job routines and procedures gained from sufficient on the job experience. Consistent, error free work based on defined regulations and standards are key measures of job performance success. The job environment promotes steady, methodical work output so that job routines can be completed on time and error-free. This position is designed to develop a valued technical expert, who, recognized and supported by management and a stable work environment, can deliver quality work on a consistent basis.
', 'Responsibilities
', 'Complete reports for monthly, quarterly, and year-end financial statements
', 'Perform various general ledger and subledger account reconciliations and correcting entries when necessary
', 'Monthly journal entries
', 'Weekly production reports
', 'Perform monthly inventory variance analysis, manufacturing variance analysis, and labour variance analysis
', 'Assist with year-end inventory count
', 'Completion of reconciliations for Internal Compliance requirements
', 'Assist in achieving departmental goals within targeted budgets by meeting deadlines for project completion using the most cost-effective method possible
', 'Other duties as assigned
', 'Requirements
', 'Minimum post-secondary education in the accounting field (university degree or community college diploma with a concentration in accounting, or equivalent)
', 'Willingness to pursue a CPA designation
', 'Previous experience (co-op or related) in the accounting field would be an asset
', 'Ability to work under pressure of time constraints
', 'High attention to detail with the ability to handle changing priorities in a deadline driven environment
', 'Strong knowledge of MS Excel is required
', 'As a member of the OSCO Construction Group, we offer a comprehensive compensation package including health and dental coverage, life insurance, RRSP and tax-free savings account options. Additionally, we offer educational bursaries to children of employees, health & wellness programming, celebratory events and employee sport team sponsorships.
', 'About OSCO
', 'The origins of the OSCO Construction Group go back to 1955 when Ocean Steel & Construction Ltd. was founded in Saint John, New Brunswick. Since that time, the OSCO Construction Group has grown to encompass four main operating sectors: ', 'Steel ', ', ', 'Concrete ', ', ', 'Construction ', 'and ', 'Corporate ', '. Within these sectors lie an ever-expanding number of companies and divisions, serving a growing market area and employing over one thousand employees.
', '
', '
', 'The OSCO Construction Group prides itself not just in embracing change, but in leading it. We drive this change by maintaining our vision to be fast, be global and be connected. All of our sectors are committed to: conducting business with integrity and fairness; continuous education & training of our employees; improving our processes; focusing on our customers’ needs; and, providing top quality products & services.']
