JOB DESCRIPTION:
["IMP Solutions, a division of IMP Group Limited, provides IT and business consulting services, and IT products to clients across Canada. Headquartered in Halifax, Nova Scotia for over fifty years, IMP Group continues to stand for diversity and strength. IMP Group has gained a very strong reputation nationally, being named one of the 50 Best Managed Companies. We are also proud to be one of Nova Scotia's Top Employers and one of Atlantic Canada's Top Employers.", '
', '
Our passion is working with organizations to provide innovative and cost-effective business solutions. Our consultants offer outstanding technical capabilities, solid business experience, and a commitment to customer-centered methodologies.', '
', '
We are expanding our Professional Services team and are actively recruiting a Business Analyst to work on client projects focused in Nova Scotia. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering business consulting services to our clients and helping to expand our services operations in Atlantic Canada', '
', '
Reporting to the Director of Professional Services, this is an exciting opportunity to be part of a talented and growing consulting team that is committed to providing service excellence to its customers, backed by a longstanding Atlantic Canadian based organization.', '
', '
', '
Job ', 'Responsibilities', ':', '
', '
', 'Work closely with client business representatives and experts to develop an understanding of, and document business requirements and business processes.', '
', '
', 'Establish the business goals, objectives and priorities (applicable to the Senior Business Analyst role).', '
', '
', 'Elicit requirements using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, scenarios, business analysis, and workflow analysis.', '
', '
', 'Lead senior management and subject matter experts through workshops and individual meetings.', '
', '
', 'Define business process and workflow models and guide our clients through business process transformations.', '
', '
', 'Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, and decompose high-level information into details.', '
', '
', 'Identify issues and propose resolutions, escalating to appropriate personnel as needed.', '
', '
', 'Assist with the development and delivery of training materials.', '
', '
', 'Plan and execute functional testing; support end-user acceptance testing.', '
', '
', 'Assist in the development and implementation of Organizational Change Management plans.', '
', '
', 'Understand Change Management practices and experience in applying within a project environment would be considered an asset.', '
', '
Job Qualifications', '
', '
', '5+ years (8+ years for the Senior position) experience as a business analyst, capturing business needs and requirements for business initiatives, large software development or implementation projects, or systems integration based projects.', '
', '
', 'Experience with business modeling techniques and tools.', '
', 'Knowledge of human-centered design principles.', '
', 'Comfortable facilitating clients through workshops and requirements gathering sessions involving senior-level to junior-level staff.', '
', 'Mentor junior BA resources (applicable to the Senior Business Analyst role).', '
', '
', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or similar post-secondary education is preferred.", '
', '
', 'Solid interpersonal skills with proven communication, listening, and team building skills.', '
', 'Demonstrated team skills and experience working in a team environment.', '
', 'Self-directed and possess strong decision-making skills.', '
', 'Risk management; identify issues and escalate as appropriate.', '
', 'Conflict resolution; negotiation skills; consensus building.', '
', 'Focused on delivering quality services to customers; client-focused.', '
', 'Previous consulting experience desired.', '
', '
', 'CBAP certification would be an asset.', '
', '
', 'Canadian Government security clearance would be beneficial.', '
', '
If you are interested in joining our winning team and have what it takes to be successful in a dynamic industry, then submit your resume in confidence along with cover letter, professional/supervisory references and salary requirements.', '
', '
Qualified applicants are invited to apply on-line', '
', '
Last date to apply: 20', 'th', ' March 2020', '
', '
IMP is committed to Employment Equity and our goal is to be a diverse workforce that is representative at all job levels. We welcome applicants from Aboriginal People, Visible Minority Groups, Persons with Disabilities and Women in occupations of positions where they are under-represented. If you are a member of one of the equity groups, you are encouraged to self-identify on either your cover letter or resume.']
CLUSTER JOB:
"IMP Solutions, a division of IMP Group Limited, provides IT and business consulting services, and IT products to clients across Canada. Headquartered in Halifax, Nova Scotia for over fifty years, IMP Group continues to stand for diversity and strength. IMP Group has gained a very strong reputation nationally, being named one of the 50 Best Managed Companies. We are also proud to be one of Nova Scotia's Top Employers and one of Atlantic Canada's Top Employers.", '
', '
Our passion is working with organizations to provide innovative and cost-effective business solutions. Our consultants offer outstanding technical capabilities, solid business experience, and a commitment to customer-centered methodologies.', '
', '
We are expanding our Professional Services team and are actively recruiting a Business Analyst to work on client projects focused in Nova Scotia. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering business consulting services to our clients and helping to expand our services operations in Atlantic Canada', '
', '
Reporting to the Director of Professional Services, this is an exciting opportunity to be part of a talented and growing consulting team that is committed to providing service excellence to its customers, backed by a longstanding Atlantic Canadian based organization.', '
', '
', '
Job ', 'Responsibilities', ':', '
', '
', 'Work closely with client business representatives and experts to develop an understanding of, and document business requirements and business processes.', '
', '
', 'Establish the business goals, objectives and priorities (applicable to the Senior Business Analyst role).', '
', '
', 'Elicit requirements using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, scenarios, business analysis, and workflow analysis.', '
', '
', 'Lead senior management and subject matter experts through workshops and individual meetings.', '
', '
', 'Define business process and workflow models and guide our clients through business process transformations.', '
', '
', 'Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, and decompose high-level information into details.', '
', '
', 'Identify issues and propose resolutions, escalating to appropriate personnel as needed.', '
', '
', 'Assist with the development and delivery of training materials.', '
', '
', 'Plan and execute functional testing; support end-user acceptance testing.', '
', '
', 'Assist in the development and implementation of Organizational Change Management plans.', '
', '
', 'Understand Change Management practices and experience in applying within a project environment would be considered an asset.', '
', '
Job Qualifications', '
', '
', '5+ years (8+ years for the Senior position) experience as a business analyst, capturing business needs and requirements for business initiatives, large software development or implementation projects, or systems integration based projects.', '
', '
', 'Experience with business modeling techniques and tools.', '
', 'Knowledge of human-centered design principles.', '
', 'Comfortable facilitating clients through workshops and requirements gathering sessions involving senior-level to junior-level staff.', '
', 'Mentor junior BA resources (applicable to the Senior Business Analyst role).', '
', '
', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or similar post-secondary education is preferred.", '
', '
', 'Solid interpersonal skills with proven communication, listening, and team building skills.', '
', 'Demonstrated team skills and experience working in a team environment.', '
', 'Self-directed and possess strong decision-making skills.', '
', 'Risk management; identify issues and escalate as appropriate.', '
', 'Conflict resolution; negotiation skills; consensus building.', '
', 'Focused on delivering quality services to customers; client-focused.', '
', 'Previous consulting experience desired.', '
', '
', 'CBAP certification would be an asset.', '
', '
', 'Canadian Government security clearance would be beneficial.', '
', '
If you are interested in joining our winning team and have what it takes to be successful in a dynamic industry, then submit your resume in confidence along with cover letter, professional/supervisory references and salary requirements.', '
', '
Qualified applicants are invited to apply on-line', '
', '
Last date to apply: 20', 'th', ' March 2020', '
', '
IMP is committed to Employment Equity and our goal is to be a diverse workforce that is representative at all job levels. We welcome applicants from Aboriginal People, Visible Minority Groups, Persons with Disabilities and Women in occupations of positions where they are under-represented. If you are a member of one of the equity groups, you are encouraged to self-identify on either your cover letter or resume

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['The Opportunity', 'SkyHive is looking for an enthusiastic ', 'Business Analyst (BA) ', 'to own the Discovery phase of engaging with Enterprise clients. The BA will solicit, understand, assess, and document the business requirements, processes and reporting needs. They will be required to partner effectively and professionally with all levels of an organization, and proactively identify opportunities, scope problems and co-create potential solutions with the customer. It is also crucial that the BA be skilled at connecting with various personalities, managing expectations (especially from detractors), and adapting stakeholders’ preferred project management methods to SkyHive’s agile philosophy and working style.', 'The Role', 'Lead the initial “discovery phase” with Enterprise-level stakeholders and other subject matter experts; preparation in the form of exhaustive research and efficient synthesis is key', 'Be very well-versed in the SkyHive technology; articulating its values and how Enterprises could leverage its capabilities to redesign and upgrade their search and acquisition of human capital', 'Provide expertise through performing gap analysis and understanding of business goals and needs, while applying relevant processes and practices and abiding by established KPIs', 'Use appropriate tools and techniques to elicit, define and analyze requirements', 'Gather critical information from formal meetings and workshops, produce useful minutes and reports, and contribute to data-driven business decisions', 'Build rapport and develop genuine relationships with customers and effectively communicate insights and plans to cross-functional team members and both technical and non-technical audiences', 'Assist with refining overall strategies, prioritizing tasks, and other business development duties as needed', 'Stay up-to-date with industry trends, as well as consolidating lessons learned to encourage further growth within SkyHive’s fast-paced and dynamic environment', 'Who are you?', 'Qualifications (Must haves)', 'A min of 3 years of experience with SaaS and software integration is a must.', 'Exceptional written and verbal communication skills including excellent documentation skills', 'Highly organized, independent and and being aware of when and how to pivot', 'Strong analytical skills and experience eliciting and creating requirements documents', 'Ability to communicate with people of various technical and business backgrounds, including the ability to explain difficult technical concepts in simple terms to business users', 'A strong team player eager to collaborate, humbly accept feedback and objectively consider multiple perspectives while always empowering the customer’s voice', 'Ability to be resourceful, creative and emotionally intelligent', 'Passion for conducting research and extracting insights', 'Working experience with wireframing and process flow diagrams', 'Nice-to-Haves', 'Software background', 'University degree, diploma or certificate in Information Technology or equivalent experience', '3+ years of work experience in a business setting', 'Experience with project management', 'Understanding of UX principles and best practices', 'Who are we?', 'As a Portfolio Company of Singularity University and voted one of BC’s top 50 tech startups by the #BCTECH Summit, SkyHive applies competency-based methodology with advanced technologies to drive unprecedented efficiency in strategic workforce planning and human capital movement.', 'With the mission of tackling global poverty and social inequality, SkyHive aims to utilize its exponential technologies to facilitate labour market transformation and foster a stronger, more prepared, and more confident workforce to welcome a brighter tomorrow.', 'What do we offer?', 'Opportunity to get your foot in the door of a fast-growing tech company', 'Collaborative team environment and culture', 'Comprehensive health benefits package - We pay for this, nothing comes off your cheque.', 'Three weeks’ paid JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Aerotek is a leading provider of professional and technical personnel services in North America, in partnership with leading companies and experts from all sectors.', '
Aerotek has currently job opportunities as Business Analyst for its client BOMBARDIER', '
', '
In your role, you will:', '
Create and maintain standard governance packages;', '
Analyze business reporting and perform root cause analysis;', '
Control customer facing action registers and implement solutions;', '
Participate in process improvement projects;', '
Lead and participate in presentations', '
Collaborate with small project teams;', '
Review detailed plans & metrics with senior management, as required;', '
Interact with different hierarchical levels of Bombardier Aerospace;', '
Prepare and lead communications based on the target audience;', '
', '
', '
As our ideal candidate,', '
You have a Bachelor degree', '
You have an excellent knowledge of French and English, written and spoken;', '
You have a good knowledge with MS Office (Project, Visio, Excel and PowerPoint);', '
You have excellent computer skills to operate word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, databases and, project management software.
', 'You have strong access database skills which is critical for you to assume responsibility of existing tools and create new tools judiciously', '
You have knowledge of SAP (asset)', '
You are a team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills', '
You have a strong work ethic and are willing to take initiative;', '
You know how to meet tight deadlines;', '
You are able to multi-task under a highly demanding and continuously changing environment;', '
You are able to work under pressure', '
You are flexible in your work hours', '
Some business travel will be required to support special project initiatives.', '
', '
', '
', "À propos d'Aerotek:", '
', '
', '
', "Notre monde nous tient à cœur. Reconnu Best of StaffingMD par nos clients et le talent que nous recrutons, AerotekMD Inc. se distingue comme chef de file du recrutement et en de la dotation de personnel grâce à sa grande compréhension des liens entre le talent et les affaires. Étant donné qu'Aerotek est un partenaire stratégique de plus de 18 000 clients et 300 000 employés contractuels chaque année, son approche axée sur les gens lui permet d'offrir un avantage concurrentiel à ses clients et des emplois gratifiants à ses employés contractuels. Aerotek, dont le siège social est à Hanover, au Maryland, exploite un réseau de plus de 250 bureaux non franchisés, comptant plus de 8 000 employés internes dévoués à servir nos clients. Aerotek est une société en exploitation d'Allegis Group, un fournisseur multinational de solutions en matière de talent. Pour en savoir davantage, consultez le site aerotek.com/fr-ca."]

', '
In your role, you will:', '
Create and maintain standard governance packages;', '
Analyze business reporting and perform root cause analysis;', '
Control customer facing action registers and implement solutions;', '
Participate in process improvement projects;', '
Lead and participate in presentations', '
Collaborate with small project teams;', '
Review detailed plans & metrics with senior management, as required;', '
Interact with different hierarchical levels of Bombardier Aerospace;', '
Prepare and lead communications based on the target audience;', '
', '
', '
As our ideal candidate,', '
You have a Bachelor degree', '
You have an excellent knowledge of French and English, written and spoken;', '
You have a good knowledge with MS Office (Project, Visio, Excel and PowerPoint);', '
You have excellent computer skills to operate word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, databases and, project management software.
', 'You have strong access database skills which is critical for you to assume responsibility of existing tools and create new tools judiciously', '
You have knowledge of SAP (asset)', '
You are a team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills', '
You have a strong work ethic and are willing to take initiative;', '
You know how to meet tight deadlines;', '
You are able to multi-task under a highly demanding and continuously changing environment;', '
You are able to work under pressure', '
You are flexible in your work hours', '
Some business travel will be required to support special project initiatives.', '
', '
', '
', "À propos d'Aerotek:", '
', '
', '
', "Notre monde nous tient à cœur. Reconnu Best of StaffingMD par nos clients et le talent que nous recrutons, AerotekMD Inc. se distingue comme chef de file du recrutement et en de la dotation de personnel grâce à sa grande compréhension des liens entre le talent et les affaires. Étant donné qu'Aerotek est un partenaire stratégique de plus de 18 000 clients et 300 000 employés contractuels chaque année, son approche axée sur les gens lui permet d'offrir un avantage concurrentiel à ses clients et des emplois gratifiants à ses employés contractuels. Aerotek, dont le siège social est à Hanover, au Maryland, exploite un réseau de plus de 250 bureaux non franchisés, comptant plus de 8 000 employés internes dévoués à servir nos clients. Aerotek est une société en exploitation d'Allegis Group, un fournisseur multinational de solutions en matière de talent. Pour en savoir davantage, consultez le site aerotek.com/fr-ca."

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Westland Insurance Group Ltd is growing and has an exciting opportunity for a ', 'Business Analyst :', 'at our ', 'Head Office:', ' located in beautiful ', 'South Surrey, BC. :', 'This individual will be responsible for reviewing and evaluating current business processes relative to Westland’s future goals and objectives.', '
', '
Named the 2018 Big Brokerage of the Year by Insurance Business Canada, Westland is one of the largest independent insurance brokers in Canada with over 1400 employees in more than 130 offices throughout BC, Alberta and Saskatchewan. We have experienced rapid expansion in the past 5 years and are positioned to continue on this growth path.', '
', '
What we offer:', '
', 'Base salary', '
', 'Comprehensive medical and dental benefits', '
', 'Diverse mix of staff and demonstrated work/life balance', '
', 'Career growth opportunities and continuing education programs', '
', '
', '
The Opportunity:', '
', '
Responsibilities:', '
', 'Serves as an intermediary between various stakeholders in our technology teams, support teams, and business units in a collaborative way to capture detailed business requirements and identify possible solutions to address the organization’s needs', '
', 'Supports and liaises with the training team in identifying system / process changes, keeps them informed as changes and / or new capabilities are introduced to the system; advises how current processes will be modified / affected; aids in the validation of training materials.', '
', 'Conducts and documents elicitation activities to collect information from various stakeholders in order to draw out the needs of the business; includes workshops, surveys, shadowing and other elicitation techniques.', '
', 'Generates high level business requirements documents in order to trace, prioritize / assess and gain sign off; generates detailed system / software requirements documents for use in developing solutions; delivers other quality project artifacts that are in line with the business needs.', '
', 'Participates in assessing the performance of pilot releases; provides potential solution, identifies limitations, and makes recommendations for improvements.', '
', 'Monitors the implementation of solutions and ensures delivered solutions are in-line with business requirements by conducting requirements testing.', '
', 'Obtains key inputs from enterprise architecture teams and identifies solution interdependencies.', '
', 'Assesses the risk of various solutions and works with the Director of IT Business Solutions to prioritize competing business demands.', '
', '
', '
Here’s what you bring:', '
', 'Minimum 3 years’ business analysis experience with a focus on Insurance or HR; or 5 years’ business analysis experience in other fields', '
', 'Bachelor’s Degree required (IT, Business Administration or related fields preferred)', '
', 'Minimum intermediate level ability in Excel, Word and SQL', '
', 'Strong understanding of business concepts (with focus on Insurance, Finance and HR) is an asset', '
', 'Broad understanding of IT domain experience, strong technical skills, business intelligence, and ability to fully understand the needs of the user', '
', 'Demonstrated analytical skills including broad knowledge / use of business analysis tools such as business process mapping, use cases and various diagrams', '
', 'Exemplary oral and written communication skills', '
', 'Demonstrated problem solving and critical thinking abilities', '
', 'Demonstrated ability to quickly absorb and understand new and complex information', '
', 'Experience in business transformation and system implementation (in Insurance, Finance and HR preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Join the CoreTracks team on a 5-year business transformation project for a large government department. We are looking for an experienced Business Analyst to assist our client with their cross-department business transformation project. To be considered for this opportunity candidates MUST have government of Canada secret security clearance, over 5 years of project experience and a relevant certification (i.e. PMP, Prince 2, CBAP or Organizational Change Management). Candidates will be responsible for assisting in capturing business requirements, re-engineering business processes, and developing a communication and change management plan.', 'As an additional asset, experience in a business transformation or major technology migration.', 'Job Types: Full-time, Contract, Freelance', 'Experience:', 'project: 3 years (Required)', 'Licence:', 'goverment of canada secret security clearance (Required)']
CLUSTER JOB: Join the CoreTracks team on a 5-year business transformation project for a large government department. Candidates will be responsible for assisting in capturing business requirements, re-engineering business processes, and developing a communication and change management plan.', 'As an additional asset, experience in a business transformation or major technology migration.', 'Job Types: Full-time, Contract, Freelance', 'Experience:', 'project: 3 years (Required)', 'Licence:', 'goverment of canada secret security clearance (Required)

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Established in 1873, Ganong has the distinction of being Canada’s oldest independently family owned and operated chocolate company. To this day, the company continues to manufacture its famous confections in the town of ', 'St. Stephen, New Brunswick', '. Ganong continues to grow in the fast paced & competitive world of food manufacturing and is currently seeking a ', 'Business Analyst', ' work within our ', 'Finance', ' department', 'Position Summary', 'Reporting to the Manager of Business Intelligence and Analytics, the Business Analyst will assist in developing and distributing reports and analysis to support various departments within the company to ensure process efficiency and overall profitability.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Completing business analyses, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions', 'Engage in marketing and sales research to provide analysis and insight into product and promotional performance with major customers', 'Collaborate with account managers to prepare product costings', 'Predictive budgeting and forecasting', 'Prepare various periodic reports for company executives/management', 'Work with Sales and Marketing to evaluate all aspects of customer profitability', 'Develop standard cost and pricing analysis for various internal customers.', 'Assist in maintaining the accuracy and integrity of the pricing data within corporate ERP system', 'Provide sales and manufacturing analysis to senior staff as requested', 'Work on continuous improvement projects throughout the organization', 'Qualifications', 'Post-Secondary education in Business or a combination of education & relevant experience', 'Ability to think critically and apply deductive reasoning with a high level of attention to detail', 'Technological intuition, both in software and webware navigating and learning', 'Extensive experience in Microsoft Excel is required', 'Strong organizational, analytical and communication skills are must-have traits', 'Confident with self-directed learning', 'Experience with Nectari, Sage X3 or similar Business Intelligence software', 'Must be legally able to work in Canada', 'Ganong appreciates all applicants; however only those selected for an interview will be contacted', 'Job Type: Full-time']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['ABOUT EUROLINE WINDOWS', 'EuroLine Windows Inc., a private Canadian company, is an innovative designer and manufacturer of custom-made, high-end, high-performance windows and doors for private residences and commercial buildings.', 'EuroLine Windows Inc. was founded in 1993 and has since grown to become the largest manufacturer of uPVC tilt & turn windows and doors in North America, with installations throughout North America and countries around the globe. Our superior product, installation and customer service have garnered us a reputation as a premium window company in the industry, both with homeowners as well as building professionals.', 'As a result of continued growth, EuroLine Windows has an opportunity for a ', 'Business Analyst ', 'to join our team!', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'The Business Analyst is responsible for providing administrative support to the Sales team and will report to the General Manager. This position is also responsible for tracking and providing forecasts to upper management.', 'The successful candidate is proactive, organized and resourceful. Excellent communication, relationship-building skills and problem-solving abilities are critical for this role. As you will often work on several assignments concurrently, time management and the ability to balance multiple tasks are extremely important in this role.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Provides administrative support to the Sales team', 'Regularly updates marketing materials', 'Ensures that all Sales Representatives have the proper materials (brochures, samples etc.); keeps track of marketing materials and samples to ensure parts are ordered', 'Ensures samples are kept up-to-date and in good condition; ensures samples are updated when Product Development and/or Production departments make changes', 'Maintains a database of all clients', 'Ensures CRM is being filled out/ maintained', 'Produces sales reports for the Sales team and upper management', 'Provides forecasts to upper management', 'Ensures sales metrics are being tracked with respects to territories, discounts, new build trends, renovation trends, economic trends', 'QUALIFICATIONS', '2 years’ experience working in an Administrative Support or Business Analyst role; previous experience supporting a Sales team an asset', 'Bachelor of Science (Maths/Physics/Stats) or Engineering preferred', 'Advanced MS Excel, MS Word, and Mathematical skills', 'Access to a vehicle is preferred', 'SALARY RANGE', '$45,000 - $55,000', 'Thank you for your interest in EuroLine Windows. Visit www.euroline-windows.com for more information about our company!', 'EuroLine Windows supports diversity, equity and a workplace free from harassment and discrimination. We are committed to providing accommodation for people with disabilities. If you require accommodation during any stages of the selection process, please notify us and we will work with you to meet your needs.', 'Job Types: Full-time, Permanent', 'Salary: $45,000.00 to $55,000.00 /year', 'Experience:', 'Customer Service : 2 years (Preferred)', 'Sales Support: 2 years (Preferred)', 'Business Analysis: 2 years (Preferred)', 'Education:', "Bachelor's Degree (Preferred)"]

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Business Analyst', 'Full Time- Temporary (up to 18 months)', 'Edmonton, AB', 'About Legal Aid Alberta', 'Legal Aid Alberta is a Centre of Excellence that helps vulnerable Albertans across the province at some of the most difficult times in their lives. Through professional, effective and accessible services that support better outcomes for our clients, we make a difference in the lives of Albertans and deliver value that extends beyond those who receive our services.', 'Legal Aid Alberta is seeking to fill a ', 'full time, temporary position (up to 18 months)', ' for Business Analyst in our downtown Edmonton office. This position will appeal to an individual that likes to take initiative, is client focused and is exceptionally strong in understanding business processes and providing and implementing opportunities for improvement.', 'Job Description', 'Reporting to the Director, Project Management Office, the Business Analyst is primarily responsible for providing a broad range of business analyst activities and support to the entire Legal Aid Alberta organization. Some of the key responsibilities include:', 'Works with stakeholders to identify issues and/or opportunities to improve business processes and add value to the delivery of services', 'Elicits, analyzes, validates and manages detailed functional and non-functional requirements using focus groups, brainstorming, workshops, surveys and other techniques', 'In coordination with the Business Process Owner, identifies and documents the current and proposed business process efficiencies', 'Conducts/writes impact assessments, business cases and feasibility studies', 'Delivers detailed design specifications including business rules, user interface designs, report designs, requirements traceability, use cases', 'Facilitates business application test planning, writes test plans, coordinates testing, develops test suites and performs solution testing.', 'Assists with the development of training materials and training users on new or changed business applications', 'Prepare technical reports by collecting, analyzing and summarizing information and trends.', 'Identifies project risks and issues', 'Conduct insightful, ad hoc analyses to investigate ongoing or one-time operational issues or IT service delivery challenges.', 'Participates in the evaluation, prioritization and requirements gathering for ongoing system changes, enhancements and selection.', 'Perform other duties as assigned', 'Qualifications/Skills', 'Post-secondary Degree or Diploma in Business Administration, Business Analyst, Process Analysis, Information Technology, or a related field.', '3 – 5 years’ experience as a Business Analyst is an asset.', 'IIBA CBAP Certification is considered an asset.', 'Very strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to clearly communicate ideas and to discuss technical issues with non-technical clients.', 'Foundational experience and knowledge related to strategic planning, strategic information management, business analysis, requirements management, data design, conceptual design, process re-engineering theory, system development life cycle, research techniques and project management methodologies and practices.', 'Knowledge of information technology architectures including: integration and application software, database, subsystem components and software.', 'Knowledge of emerging methods, procedures, tools, technology, best practices and techniques within the IT industry.', 'Excellent interpersonal, facilitation, consultation, presentation, leadership, particularly when communicating original concepts.', 'Superior conceptual, analytical skills and problem-solving proficiency.', 'Strong critical thinking and evaluation skills.', 'Exercise sound judgment while maintaining an organization-wide perspective.', 'Operate effectively in a matrix environment; organize work, manage time and priorities and consistently meet deadlines, while working independently on multiple and complex assignments.', 'Interpret and apply organizational operations, policies, legislation and regulations in the development of new business processes and solutions.', 'Basic knowledge and experience with Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Microsoft Great Plains is considered an asset.', 'Basic understanding of waterfall and Agile Methodology.', 'Why work for Legal Aid Alberta?', 'Besides being a part of something that will make you feel good and be proud of where you work, Legal Aid Alberta offers a competitive compensation package, above average benefits package and a great team of people to work with.', 'If you got excited at the prospect of being a part of our team when you reviewed this posting and you meet the minimum qualifications, please forward your resume ', 'referencing posting number LAA-20-21.', 'This competition will remain open until a suitable candidate is found. Only those applicants selected for an interview will be contacted', '.', 'Reference ID: LAA-20-21', 'Job Types: Full-time, Temporary', 'Experience:', 'Business Analyst: 3 years (Required)', 'Education:', "Bachelor's Degree (Required)"]
CLUSTER JOB: Business Analyst', 'Full Time- Temporary (up to 18 months)', 'Edmonton, AB', 'About Legal Aid Alberta', 'Legal Aid Alberta is a Centre of Excellence that helps vulnerable Albertans across the province at some of the most difficult times in their lives. Through professional, effective and accessible services that support better outcomes for our clients, we make a difference in the lives of Albertans and deliver value that extends beyond those who receive our services.', 'Legal Aid Alberta is seeking to fill a ', 'full time, temporary position (up to 18 months)', ' for Business Analyst in our downtown Edmonton office. This position will appeal to an individual that likes to take initiative, is client focused and is exceptionally strong in understanding business processes and providing and implementing opportunities for improvement.', 'Job Description', 'Reporting to the Director, Project Management Office, the Business Analyst is primarily responsible for providing a broad range of business analyst activities and support to the entire Legal Aid Alberta organization. Some of the key responsibilities include:', 'Works with stakeholders to identify issues and/or opportunities to improve business processes and add value to the delivery of services', 'Elicits, analyzes, validates and manages detailed functional and non-functional requirements using focus groups, brainstorming, workshops, surveys and other techniques', 'In coordination with the Business Process Owner, identifies and documents the current and proposed business process efficiencies', 'Conducts/writes impact assessments, business cases and feasibility studies', 'Delivers detailed design specifications including business rules, user interface designs, report designs, requirements traceability, use cases', 'Facilitates business application test planning, writes test plans, coordinates testing, develops test suites and performs solution testing.', 'Assists with the development of training materials and training users on new or changed business applications', 'Prepare technical reports by collecting, analyzing and summarizing information and trends.', 'Identifies project risks and issues', 'Conduct insightful, ad hoc analyses to investigate ongoing or one-time operational issues or IT service delivery challenges.', 'Participates in the evaluation, prioritization and requirements gathering for ongoing system changes, enhancements and selection.', 'Perform other duties as assigned', 'Qualifications/Skills', 'Post-secondary Degree or Diploma in Business Administration, Business Analyst, Process Analysis, Information Technology, or a related field.', '3 – 5 years’ experience as a Business Analyst is an asset.', 'IIBA CBAP Certification is considered an asset.', 'Very strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to clearly communicate ideas and to discuss technical issues with non-technical clients.', 'Foundational experience and knowledge related to strategic planning, strategic information management, business analysis, requirements management, data design, conceptual design, process re-engineering theory, system development life cycle, research techniques and project management methodologies and practices.', 'Knowledge of information technology architectures including: integration and application software, database, subsystem components and software.', 'Knowledge of emerging methods, procedures, tools, technology, best practices and techniques within the IT industry.', 'Excellent interpersonal, facilitation, consultation, presentation, leadership, particularly when communicating original concepts.', 'Superior conceptual, analytical skills and problem-solving proficiency.', 'Strong critical thinking and evaluation skills.', 'Exercise sound judgment while maintaining an organization-wide perspective.', 'Operate effectively in a matrix environment; organize work, manage time and priorities and consistently meet deadlines, while working independently on multiple and complex assignments.', 'Interpret and apply organizational operations, policies, legislation and regulations in the development of new business processes and solutions.', 'Basic knowledge and experience with Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Microsoft Great Plains is considered an asset.', 'Basic understanding of waterfall and Agile Methodology.', 'Why work for Legal Aid Alberta?', 'Besides being a part of something that will make you feel good and be proud of where you work, Legal Aid Alberta offers a competitive compensation package, above average benefits package and a great team of people to work with.', 'If you got excited at the prospect of being a part of our team when you reviewed this posting and you meet the minimum qualifications, please forward your resume ', 'referencing posting number LAA-20-21.', 'This competition will remain open until a suitable candidate is found. Only those applicants selected for an interview will be contacted', '.', 'Reference ID: LAA-20-21', 'Job Types: Full-time, Temporary', 'Experience:', 'Business Analyst: 3 years (Required)', 'Education:', "Bachelor's Degree (Required)"

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['The IT Business Analyst analyzes changes in business needs, evaluates the impacts as well as the potential technological stakes. The analyst helps users with completing feasibility studies, defining the scope of the project and preparing analyses of business cases, or business opportunity studies. The Analyst works in collaboration with the personnel of the head office, the plants, corporate stores and franchises.', '
', 'Tasks and Responsabilities', '
', 'To be part of an agile team and when needed;', '
Lead the capture and review of needs as well as preparing detailed requirements;', '
Organize meetings with clients and coordinate communications concerning the development tasks and tests;', '
Work with clients to establish approval test criteria;', '
Participate in defining integration, user approval and regression tests;', '
Ensure requirement traceability for version deliveries (sprint mode);', '
Carry out functional analyses to identify information, procedures and decision flows;', '
Translate the business needs into technical objectives for the development teams;
', 'Evaluate the procedures and exit methods and propose improvements;', '
In cases of integrating systems: define and document interfaces and integration points.', '
Dans le cas d’intégration des systèmes : Définir et documenter les interfaces et points d’intégration.', '
', '
Project Coordination', '
Manage short term projects (2–3 weeks);', '
Coordinate development team and client requests;', '
Inform all stakeholders of any changes brought to the different processes and systems;', '
Complete all the documentation by using the project scope definition model and ensure its tracking;', '
Participate in system approval tests.', '
', 'Job Requirements', '
', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business administration or in computer sciences.', '
2 to 5 years of experience as a business analyst.', '
Experience with Microsoft’s Dynamics CRM project, an asset.', '
Experience with Microsoft Dynamics Nav project, an asset.', '
Experience in case management or risk management.', '
Experience with the business analysis model (BMA) and the organizational process documentation.', '
Solid knowledge of retail sales systems management and/or of manufacturing.', '
Professional accreditation in business analysis, an asset.', '
CRM Certification, an asset.', '
', 'Demonstrated Skills', '
', '
', 'Excellent listening skills and interpersonal relations to understand the end users’ needs.', '
Excellent communication skills in both speaking and in writing French and English.', '
Able to influence, convince and initiate changes.', '
Strong analytical sense and synthesizing skills', '
Problem resolution and innovative abilities.', '
Easily establish priorities, meet deadlines and work inside a rapidly changing environment.
', 'Capable of working in collaboration with different sectors of the enterprise and ITs.', '
Aptitude for teamwork.', '
', '
Technologies', '
Proficiency with MS Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Visio (BPMN formalism).', '
Understanding of CRM and ERP systems.', '
Experience with the Atlassian suite.', '
Very good understanding of interactions between systems.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Are you looking to join an award-winning organization with a competitive compensation and benefits package? Source Atlantic is an innovative and industry-leading distribution and service company passionate about delivering value and exceptional service to customers in Canada and beyond. Source Atlantic provides a complete and single source of distribution to the industrial, government, commercial and residential markets and is proud to be distinguished as one of Canada’s Best Managed Companies since 2017. We are partnered with hundreds of world class suppliers, offer a multitude of specialized and technical services, and have many value-added solutions designed to improve our customers’ efficiency and productivity.
', 'A vital strength within Source Atlantic is its team of dedicated, honest, and customer-oriented employees. A willingness to improve and achieve are evident throughout the company because of focus on value added services for our customers, technological advances, and employee training.
', 'Source Atlantic is seeking a ', 'Business Analyst ', 'in ', 'Saint John, NB ', 'to support an established and growing IT team.
', 'The candidate should possess the following qualifications:
', 'A Degree in Business Administration or Computer Science, or a combination of education and relevant experience
', 'IT experience in Project Leadership Role would be an asset
', 'ITIL Certification would be considered an asset
', 'Experience with Field Service Software would be considered and asset
', 'Experience in Industrial Distribution would be considered and asset
', 'Ability to define, move toward, and meet project deadlines
', 'Expectations of the ', 'Business Analyst ', 'Role:
', 'IT Project Coordination
', 'Acts as a liaison with department personnel to achieve understanding of business processes, user needs, program objectives and proactively searches for software solutions which aligns to our overall business strategy
', 'Perform requirements gathering and analysis with strength in formalizing user needs into a structured format
', 'Work simultaneously with resources from multiple geographically disparate professional disciplines
', 'Participate in the recommendation and development of application system process improvements as part of a solution;
', 'Manage project tasks, activities, documentation, etc
', 'Assist with development of test plans to ensure successful project implementation
', 'Assist in the migration of new technology from trial phase to production rollout', '
', 'In return for the above, we are offering a permanent position on an established team in a great working environment.
', 'All full-time positions offer a Comprehensive Benefits Package, including:
', 'Competitive Pay Scale
', 'Flexible Health, Drug and Dental Plan
', 'Matching Contribution Retirement Savings Plan
', 'Life and Disability Insurance Options
', 'Confidential Employee Assistance Program
', 'Service Awards Program
', 'Enhanced Vacation Entitlement
', 'Physical Fitness Refund Plan
', 'Source Atlantic is an equal opportunity employer. ', 'All candidates will be considered for this position.
', 'If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume by clicking “Apply Online Now”.
', 'We thank all applicants for their interest, however, only those candidates who will be moving on in the interview process will be contacted.']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['When you see numbers on a page, does a story unfold before you?', 'When people around you have competing opinions, you let data decide.', 'Your data-driven insights and reports will help our team make better decisions, so we can champion 10x more consumers with every product, feature, and piece of content we decide to produce.', 'Who we are', 'Proudly based in Atlantic Canada, HowToSaveMoney.ca and creditcardGenius.ca have become two of the top resources for Canadian consumers.', 'Our mission? ', 'Make money easy and fun for everyone.', 'If you want in on that mission, then read on…', 'Who we need', 'We need an analytical and detail-oriented ', 'Business Analyst ', 'to work with our leadership team and liaise with our cross-functional teams.', "You'll sharpen each decision we make with your data-driven research and reports.", "You'll develop and design experiments, track results, and drive company-wide changes.", "You'll monitor results using our suite of leading edge analytics tools, spot emerging trends, and answer important questions in order to maximize opportunities and results.", "You'll champion growth and impact so each decision we make can help reach as many consumers as possible.", "You'll stay up to date with IT and industry advancements, and share what you know with the rest of the team.", "You'll support stretch projects and assist the team as needed.", "You'll wear many different hats in a lean, agile, and fast-paced culture.", 'Who you are', 'You care about your work, you know your stuff, and you go the extra mile.', "You're no ordinary number cruncher: you bathe yourself in data letting it speak to you until you've proven what's true without a shadow of a doubt.", "You have a Bachelor's degree in Business, Data Analytics, or equivalent.", 'You have at least 4 years of progressive experience working with in-depth data.', "You love numbers, spreadsheets, advanced analytics tools, and Big Data doesn't scare you.", 'You can find anything online using advanced search features and unconventional keywords.', 'You love technology, live in the cloud, and can learn and adapt quickly.', 'You know HTML, CSS, WordPress, and maybe a little bit of coding.', "You're a voracious reader, always hungry to learn.", 'Tech we use', "Always expanding our tech and data analysis stack, we make sure we're using the right tool for the job. You should be familiar with several of the following and similar technologies:", 'Google Analytics, Data Studio, G Suite, Search Console, Trends, and Optimize', 'Julia, Python, and their integrated stats packages', 'SEMRush, SERPStat, and Alexa', 'Social media ad platforms', 'Kibana, and Elasticsearch', "What you'll get", "We take care of our team. JOB DESCRIPTION:
['The Opportunity
SkyHive is looking for an enthusiastic Business Analyst (BA) to own the Discovery phase of engaging with Enterprise clients. The BA will solicit, understand, assess, and document the business requirements, processes and reporting needs. They will be required to partner effectively and professionally with all levels of an organization, and proactively identify opportunities, scope problems and co-create potential solutions with the customer. It is also crucial that the BA be skilled at connecting with various personalities, managing expectations (especially from detractors), and adapting stakeholders’ preferred project management methods to SkyHive’s agile philosophy and working style.
The Role
• Lead the initial “discovery phase” with Enterprise-level stakeholders and other subject matter experts; preparation in the form of exhaustive research and efficient synthesis is key
• Be very well-versed in the SkyHive technology; articulating its values and how Enterprises could leverage its capabilities to redesign and upgrade their search and acquisition of human capital
• Provide expertise through performing gap analysis and understanding of business goals and needs, while applying relevant processes and practices and abiding by established KPIs
• Use appropriate tools and techniques to elicit, define and analyze requirements
• Gather critical information from formal meetings and workshops, produce useful minutes and reports, and contribute to data-driven business decisions
• Build rapport and develop genuine relationships with customers and effectively communicate insights and plans to cross-functional team members and both technical and non-technical audiences
• Assist with refining overall strategies, prioritizing tasks, and other business development duties as needed
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, as well as consolidating lessons learned to encourage further growth within SkyHive’s fast-paced and dynamic environment
Who are you?
Qualifications (Must haves)
• Experience with SaaS and Software Integration is a must.
• Exceptional written and verbal communication skills including excellent documentation skills
• Highly organized, independent and detail-oriented self-starter
• Experience writing user stories and use cases and following product releases through to completion
• Comfortable dealing with and responding to ambiguous situations and being aware of when and how to pivot
• Strong analytical skills and experience eliciting and creating requirements documents
• Ability to communicate with people of various technical and business backgrounds, including the ability to explain difficult technical concepts in simple terms to business users
• A strong team player eager to collaborate, humbly accept feedback and objectively consider multiple perspectives while always empowering the customer’s voice
• Ability to be resourceful, creative and emotionally intelligent
• Passion for conducting research and extracting insights
• Working experience with wireframing and process flow diagrams
Nice-to-Haves
• Software background
• University degree, diploma or certificate in Information Technology or equivalent experience
• 2+ years of work experience in a business setting
• Experience with project management
• Understanding of UX principles and best practices', '
Who are we?
As a Portfolio Company of Singularity University and voted one of BC’s top 50 tech startups by the #BCTECH Summit, SkyHive applies competency-based methodology with advanced technologies to drive unprecedented efficiency in strategic workforce planning and human capital movement.
With the mission of tackling global poverty and social inequality, SkyHive aims to utilize its exponential technologies to facilitate labour market transformation and foster a stronger, more prepared, and more confident workforce to welcome a brighter tomorrow.
What do we offer?
• Opportunity to get your foot in the door of a fast-growing tech company
• Collaborative team environment and culture
• Comprehensive health benefits package - We pay for this, nothing comes off your cheque.
• Three weeks’ paid vacation to start, paid holidays and birthday leave!
• Stock options & gainsharing plan
• Certified B-Corporation
• Paid & unpaid volunteer time off
• Charitable donation-matching program to support your favorite charity.
• Opportunity to explore other departments as training and career continues.
• Professional development assistance program that covers professional continuing education
• Beautiful office in A1 location (Views, Views, Views)
• Numerous employee appreciation events throughout the year']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['PURELY CRM - VANCOUVER BC', '
We are recruiting for our Vancouver, BC location.', '
We’re looking for a Business Analyst to become a core member of our team. We’re looking for a self-motivated, detail oriented, team-player with good communication skills who wants to learn new skills. Join a small, experienced team in building great Dynamics CRM applications that our clients love.', '
No prior Dynamics CRM experience is required, full product training will be given.', '
The Role of the Business Analyst', '
In today’s complex business environment, an organization’s adaptability, agility, and ability to manage constant change through innovation can be keys to success. Traditional methods may no longer lead to reaching objectives when economic conditions are unfavorable. That’s where business analysis comes in. Corporations achieve goals through projects that translate customer needs into new products, services, and profits. Business analysts can make it all happen more efficiently and effectively.', "
The business analyst's primary objective is helping businesses implement technology solutions in a cost-effective way by determining the requirements of a project or program, and communicating them clearly to stakeholders, facilitators and partners. In terms of Purely CRM, the Business Analyst is helping businesses implement Dynamics CRM.", '
Requirements Are the Core of the Business Analyst’s Role', '
Requirements management is one of the core skills of Business Analysts, the role begins with defining, analyzing and documenting requirements. Managing requirements at the project level helps fulfill business needs.', '
Business analysts typically take the lead role in:', '
Assisting with the business case', '
Planning and monitoring', '
Eliciting requirements', '
Translating and simplifying requirements', '
Requirements analysis', '
Application testing', '
Client training', '
Skilled Business Analysts also use requirements to drive the design or review of test cases, process change requests, and manage a project’s scope, acceptance, installation and deployment.', '
Business Analyst Deliverables', '
The specific job deliverables of a Business Analyst at Purely CRM include:', '
Requirements documents (generally business workflows)', '
Design documents', '
Test cases', '
Training documentation', '
', '
This opportunity is for you if you have:', '
Completed a Bachelor’s degree in Business or Management Information Systems or a related area.', '
Experience with any of the following MS Word, MS Excel, MS Visio, Lucid Chart, Balsamiq, Xmind.', '
An inquisitive mind and love to learn new processes.', '
A passion for creating process diagrams and documentation.', '
A passion for problem solving.', '
Excellent written and spoken English language skills.', '
', '
Why this opportunity is great:', '
Be part of a small, experienced, energetic team working on a rapid, agile development schedule', '
Competitive salary and benefits', '
Opportunity for growth in the company', '
Purely CRM Consulting Inc is 100% focused on Microsoft Dynamics CRM. As a team we have been involved with Dynamics CRM since version 1.0 which dates back to the early 2000’s and we bring a combined 50+ years’ experience. We stand behind Microsoft Dynamics CRM as a platform and the quality of our work in order to provide the best service for our clients.', '
As a new employee we’re not requiring you to have Microsoft Dynamics product experience, but you must be willing to learn new applications. Training and mentoring will be provided. Our Vancouver office is based in Downtown Vancouver, however we have clients throughout GVRD and our work takes place at our office and client sites, so you must have the means to travel to client sites within GVRD. We also have clients in North America; Seattle, San Jose, Napa, Miami, Houston and you must be willing to travel within North America, up to 50% of the time.', '
', '
Job Type: Full-time', '
Local candidates only: You ', 'MUST', ' currently reside in Vancouver, BC and you must be legally eligible to work in Vancouver.', "
Required education: Bachelor's", '
Required language: English, excellent written and spoken English required.', '
If you are interested in joining our team, please send your resume to careers@purelycrm.com', '
Please do not apply for this position if you do not already live in Vancouver, BC.']

['JOB DESCRIPTION
', '
', 'WE ARE A TRANSFORMATIONAL PARTNER', "
Momentus is an innovation lab in Softvision's Studio Network. We marry design and engineering language in ways that produce impactful and memorable experience journeys. We partner all the way to continuously improve our clients’ digital maturity. Our Studio network brings the optimal combination of skill, scale, and cost for each stage of the product development lifecycle. And to do this we need great transformational people that want to impact the projects and organizations that they work with.", '
We are looking for an exceptional ', 'Business Analyst', ' to work with our cross-functional team, and join our world-class community of talented experts. Core to this need are:', '
', '
2+ years experience as a Business Analyst working with digital design solutions', '
', 'Web and server side software project experience', '
', 'Experience with Agile development', '
', 'Ability to interpret customer needs and apply them to existing or new products', '
', 'Experience working with a technology group in large, complex product development', '
', 'Confidence in communicating with different stakeholders, especially with Senior Management', '
', 'Ability to travel within the US', '
', 'Experience with using analytics and metrics and deriving insights from them using appropriate statistical methods', '
', '
Key Responsibilities:', '
', '
Work with key stakeholders in analyzing requirements against existing product solution functionality to drive out gaps and define new requirements based on technical constraints.', '
', 'Documentation of critical information shared during strategy, design, development, and release meetings.', '
', 'Capture and author user stories, user scenarios and use cases that accurately reflect business requirements.', '
', 'Work closely and collaborate with UI/UX design team to conceptualize requirements, turning high level requirements into wireframes, prototypes, final designs and assets.', '
', 'Experience in usability testing and project management', '
', 'Experience in creating, maintaining, and communication of product roadmaps', '
', 'Excellent presentation skills', '
', 'Experience with the Agile project management process', '
', '
So if this all sounds like you....great! Please apply and let us know what makes you our next great hire. We are a thriving Community of top technology talent that is globally connected. We Engage, Make, Run and Evolve the technology that makes many brands that you know and love. So let’s take this journey together. No matter where you are on your digital career roadmap, we can help you grow and have fun doing it. Thanks for your interest.', '
Momentus / Softvision LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. No 3rd Party Agency Candidates.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Company Description', '
', '
As one of the largest independent technology companies in Atlantic Canada, Mariner has a team of over 200 IT, software professionals and management consultants working with clients both regionally and across the globe. With extensive capabilities in the areas of analytics, automation software, information security, change management and IT consulting, Mariner has been delivering innovative solutions with a strong emphasis on productivity and customer experience since 2003.', '
', '
', 'Job Description', '
', '
To help in our planned growth, we are recruiting for a Business Analyst for an upcoming opportunity for our client based in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The Senior Business Analyst will be a key member of our IT Professional Services team. In this role, you will be responsible for client-based projects and, in collaboration with our delivery and sales teams, you will deliver best of breed solutions to new and existing customers.', '
', '
', 'Qualifications', '
', '
Major Responsibilities:', '
Strong understanding of processes and an initiative to implement', '
Documentation of current and future state process mapping', '
Define configuration specifications and business analysis requirements', '
Prepare Business Requirements Documents, including functional/non-functional requirements', '
Managing process change', '
Collaborate in the development of test plans and test cases', '
Prepare integration plans for deployment of system changes into existing environments', '
Help design, document and maintain system processes', '
Facilitate stakeholder sessions, interviews, and analysis to identify areas for process and systems improvement', '
Communicate key insights and findings to client team', '
Qualifications:', '
Experience in Manufacturing is a strong asset', '
Post-secondary education in business, computer science, or a related field from a recognized institution', '
8+ years of progressive corporate experience functioning as an IT Business Analyst/Process Analyst', '
CBAP certification or willing to obtain', '
Demonstrated success with business requirements analysis, group facilitation, gap analysis and process mapping and design as part of a business transformation', '
Experience in working in a formal systems development lifecycle methodology environment involving such artifacts as functional and detail design documents, business use cases, and requirements traceability', '
Demonstrated skill in building consensus among process stakeholders', '
Exceptional communication skills and experience in working with business experts at all levels and technical subject matter experts', '
Experience working in client-based consulting role is highly desirable', '
Specific reference-able project experience in one or more of the following areas highly desirable: Cycle Counting, Production Scheduling and Material Requirements Planning', '
Good understanding of inventory control, capacity planning and shop floor management are considered assets', '
Software expertise is not required', '
Familiarity with Project Accounting is considered an asset', '
Additional Information', '
', '
Why Mariner Partners?', '
We believe in making a positive impact in the communities where we live and work – our team is located in major cities all across Canada, throughout the US and internationally. We are proud to be headquartered in Atlantic Canada, and are passionate about growing a strong technology sector here in Atlantic Canada and beyond. We offer competitive compensation; benefits packages and training and development.', '
We recognize that empowered employees are more innovative, more efficient, deliver better customer service and can flat out-perform conventional organizations. Mariner Innovations has delivered projects and services to leading Canadian organizations in industries such as Oil & Gas, Telecom, Utilities, and Government.', '
We are looking for passionate IT professionals who love solving problems for customers and who want to grow their careers.', '
Join our growing team!']

Specific reference-able project experience in one or more of the following areas highly desirable: Cycle Counting, Production Scheduling and Material Requirements Planning', '
Good understanding of inventory control, capacity planning and shop floor management are considered assets', '
Software expertise is not required', '
Familiarity with Project Accounting is considered an asset', '
Additional Information', '
', '
Why Mariner Partners?', '
We believe in making a positive impact in the communities where we live and work – our team is located in major cities all across Canada, throughout the US and internationally. We are proud to be headquartered in Atlantic Canada, and are passionate about growing a strong technology sector here in Atlantic Canada and beyond. We offer competitive compensation; benefits packages and training and development.', '
We recognize that empowered employees are more innovative, more efficient, deliver better customer service and can flat out-perform conventional organizations. Mariner Innovations has delivered projects and services to leading Canadian organizations in industries such as Oil & Gas, Telecom, Utilities, and Government.', '
We are looking for passionate IT professionals who love solving problems for customers and who want to grow their careers.', '
Join our growing team!

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Business Analyst - Mobile and Maxis Quality Verification
', 'Description
', '
Our organization enables the success of EA at ensuring that our games are delivered to the market as fast as possible with the highest degree of quality and fun! We provide services to our studios to test our games, to measure their performance, to help business using player telemetry, and to widen our early player engagements. And we are looking for you to join us so that we can realign and transform our services so that we can ensure EA is successful in the future. Here is what we are looking for:
', '
You are an experienced business professional who has been working in this area for the past 3+ years with experience supporting systems solutions, business analysis and data management. You seek challenges and personal development opportunities and have the courage to make a difference. You are always looking for more efficient ways to manage processes and company assets. You have advanced experience with Database Query and have experience with Reporting Tools such as PowerBI. Experience in Project Management. You have a professional degree in Data Management, Business, Math or related discipline.
', '
You will report to the Operations Lead.
', '
Join us to design and transform our organization from the existing model of quality verification to a digital, engineering-based, and automated future!
', 'You Will ...
', '
Work with the head of our team, the operations lead, and the engineering lead to develop the data model on business/operation/development process.
', 'Use the data models, gather data, perform analysis so that we can accomplish our mission to transform our organization to the highest efficiency.
', 'Outside of the core requirements, perform in-depth data analysis to identify areas of risk, opportunities and recommend solutions.
', "Partner in the creation and tracking of KPI's that monitor the performance of projects.
", 'Build ingestion processes to prepare, extract, and enrich a variety of structured and unstructured data sources.
', 'Use a hypothesis-driven, problem-solving approach to design, construct, and test/iterate exploratory models that reveal insight and opportunities for the client; proactively broaden and deepen client relationships by working with varying levels of client team members.
', 'Develop complex SQL queries to ask questions of large/complex datasets.
', 'Required Qualifications
', '
Experience of 3+ years working with data from a variety of databases.
', 'Experience of 4+ years performing all aspects of business and enterprise-level analysis.
', 'Experience communicating complex ideas and solutions and you are open to ideas from others.
', 'Independent ability to review the data quality and data definitions, and perform data cleansing and data management tasks.
', 'Knowledge or experience in the following:', ' SQL, BI tools (like Tableau and PowerBI), Python, R, ETL.
', 'B.S in Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or Engineering Sciences with specialization in Business Systems Analysis, Business Intelligence, Data Analysis and Reporting, or similar.
', 'Desirable Qualifications
', '
Explain data and analytics concepts to non-technical team members.
', 'Apply data and analytics concepts to business problems.
', 'Partnership building skills to work with partners, colleagues, and the wider community.
', 'Provide crucial consultation, analysis, and recommendations on a broad range of projects in a deadline-driven environment with ambiguity.
', 'Comfortable working in an international context, within virtual teams and can work with international partners']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Job Description', 'Are you able to able to proactively drive work forward, even in the face of ambiguity or limited information, while others are paralyzed by having too many options or not knowing where to start? Are you zealous in your preparation and learning, always actively looking to improve upon existing ideas and methods? Are you highly competent in building relationships and credibility through action and delivery? At Norima, our people collaboratively tackle the most difficult technology challenges and never hesitate to put in the time needed to comprehensively grind a problem. If you have an emotional attachment to your work, are naturally inclined to think beyond the direct boundaries of a specific problem and enjoy collaboratively helping to identify the path to deliver value, we’d like to have a chat.', 'Norima, a technology consulting company that prides itself on its ability to deliver results in the most complex and challenging business environments is in need of experienced Business Analysts with functional and technical expertise to join one of our key delivery teams. We are looking for candidates with exemplary character, consistency and competence to join a growing team of professionals who share a passion for solving complex problems with technology-based solutions. Ideally you have:', 'Completed a university degree or college diploma;', 'A minimum of five (5) years proven working experience in information technologies;', 'Exceptional communications and elicitation skills; and', 'Knowledge and experience in the IIBA BA Body of Knowledge (BABOK);', '\ufeffThis role is located in Winnipeg - relocation is required', 'Overall Qualifications', 'Norima is a fast-paced, entrepreneurial company, looking to hire the best, brightest, and hardest working consultants onto our high-calibre team. As the ideal candidate, you:', 'Are client delivery focused, and committed to working as a flexible extension to our clients to earn a place as their trusted advisor;', 'Possess superior written and verbal communication skills;', 'Have a natural curiosity towards gaining new understanding and broadening your knowledge base;', 'Are skilled in managing and prioritizing multiple projects and competing deadlines; and', 'Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills;', 'Are practiced in conducting market research and business case development.', 'Additional Technical Requirements', 'Experience facilitating working sessions for requirements discovery, for problem investigation, to gain group consensus, and/or to aid decision making;', 'The ability to model, abstract, and simplify complex concepts so that they can be understood by a variety of stakeholders;', 'Practiced in documenting use cases and associated processes, including data modeling, functional specification modeling and process modeling;', 'Comfortable developing clear, concise and detailed documentation, including functional and non-functional specifications;', 'Effective communication of requirements and specifications to a variety of audiences, including business users, technical stakeholders and senior leadership;', 'Develop training material to support new processes, systems, roles and responsibilities', 'Proactively manage organizational change through effective stakeholder engagement and communication', 'Implement standards, processes and best practices at any level of an organization', 'Demonstrated ability to analyze and solve technology-related business problems;', 'Experience gathering and developing current and future state documentation; and', 'Strong understanding of the benefits and limitations of various SDLC methodologies (Waterfall & Agile).', 'Why Norima?', 'For over 10 years, Norima Consulting Inc. has been transforming businesses by leveraging the right technology, at the right time, by, and in collaboration with, the right people. Norima has been consistently growing in both size and revenue for over a decade, almost exclusively by word of mouth, and this has only been possible by ensuring that we have been an employer of choice for top professionals who are passionate about demonstrating real results and committed to achieving excellence.', 'Norima works hard to provide a collaborative, rewarding environment and work opportunities that attract and retain top candidates and employees. Norima’s Learning and Growth strategy is to actively invest in professional development and to provide opportunity for progressive work assignments to build experience. Norima is a place where professional growth is actively supported and expected.', 'According to independent employee reviews on Glassdoor.com, 100% would recommend Norima to a friend, and 100% approve of the CEO. Norima has a summary score of 4.9 stars out of 5.0.', 'We offer competitive compensation and benefits, an RRSP matching program, a professional development program, and a positive work environment. This is a great opportunity to be at the heart of a growing company.', 'If you are interested in this position, please respond with a resume and cover letter in PDF and please include the job reference code in your cover letter.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Experience:', 'sql: 1 year (Preferred)']
