JOB DESCRIPTION: ['The Opportunity ', 'We’re looking for a self-motivated and passionate individual to join the fast-paced environment as a Business Analyst with the Digital Solutions Team at Pollard Banknote.', 'In this role, you will be responsible for working with many different internal and external teams to gather requirements and manage the effective planning and lifecycle management of digital solutions for the lottery industry.', 'As a Business Analyst, you will maintain product backlog, create a product roadmap, direct the project team and assist in systems analysis. Product planning responsibilities include awareness and analysis of systems and operational needs and translates them to product requirements and roadmap, and ensure the team has the tools and the expertise to deliver the product.', 'Key Responsibilities', '*', 'Liaise with business and development teams to facilitate the development of new digital products and enhance existing products', 'Perform System Analysis and deliver technical solutions to address system break-fix and change requests as part of deliverables', 'Work with the Product Director and other internal and external stakeholders to prioritize and maintain the product backlog and roadmap', 'Coordinate initiatives for small to medium projects, including, identifying, tracking and resolving technical issues for assigned business application systems', 'Solicit goals and requirements (functional and non-functional) through interviews, workshops, and reviews of existing documentation/procedures', 'Ensuring analysis is sufficiently on track and in front of development far enough to ensure the next successful iteration', 'Assist in validating test plans and building test cases', 'Apply an excellent understanding of SDLC, including how it relates to the various software development methodologies and processes (e.g., Agile, RUP, Waterfall, Scrum) to deliver functionality', 'Authoring and completing refined and measurable user stories to ensure comprehension of stories by Project Team members, including the review of any applicable wireframe mockups, tasks required to complete the user story, and relevant acceptance criteria.', 'Provide thought leadership in business and system analysis approaches', 'Participate and facilitate (as required) in product owner, sprint planning, daily scrum and retrospective meetings.', 'Qualifications', 'Post-secondary education in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Business Analysis, or equivalent combination of education and experience', 'Minimum 5 years’ experience in Systems or Business Analysis in an Agile environment', 'Knowledge of technology trends across the industry and best practices within the Software Development Life Cycles (SDLC)', 'Experience with Agile Methodologies, inclusive of Scrum/Iterations, incremental releases, user stories, and Kanban technique', 'Familiarity with Atlassian tools (Bitbucket, Jira, etc.)', 'Familiarity with IT Service Management processes (change, incident, problem and service request).', 'Knowledge of API services', 'Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities within a fast-paced environment and demonstrated a track record of delivering complex solutions on time and budget', 'Ability to apply a high level of problem-solving skills and expertise, with keen attention to detail, to analyze and report on actions and/or solutions', 'Ability to establish and maintain strong relationships with internal and external clients at all levels', 'Superior written and verbal communication skills', 'Understanding of SQL, XML and JSON is considered an asset', 'Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or Certificate in Agile is considered an asset', 'Pollard Banknote offers a challenging, team-oriented environment, competitive compensation, profit sharing program, company pension and opportunities for professional development. Interested candidates are encouraged to submit a cover letter outlining fit and salary expectations along with a résumé to:', 'Pollard Banknote Limited', '140 Otter Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 0M8', 'www.pollardbanknote.com', 'Pollard Banknote Limited is an equal opportunity employer, committed to maintaining a diverse workforce.', 'We thank all candidates that apply, however only those selected for an interview will be contacted.', 'Employment is contingent upon a satisfactory response from a Criminal Record Search.', 'Job Types: Full-time, Permanent', 'Experience:', 'Business Analysis: 3 years (Required)', 'Agile: 1 year (Preferred)', 'Location:', 'Winnipeg, MB (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['WE ARE A TRANSFORMATIONAL PARTNER
', "
Momentus is an innovation lab in Softvision's Studio Network. We marry design and engineering language in ways that produce impactful and memorable experience journeys. We partner all the way to continuously improve our clients’ digital maturity. Our Studio network brings the optimal combination of skill, scale, and cost for each stage of the product development lifecycle. And to do this we need great transformational people that want to impact the projects and organizations that they work with.
", '
We are looking for an exceptional Business Analyst to work with our cross-functional team, and join our world-class community of talented experts. Core to this need are:
', '
', '
', '2+ years experience as a Business Analyst working with digital design solutions', '
', 'Web and server side software project experience', '
', 'Experience with Agile development', '
', 'Ability to interpret customer needs and apply them to existing or new products', '
', 'Experience working with a technology group in large, complex product development', '
', 'Confidence in communicating with different stakeholders, especially with Senior Management', '
', 'Ability to travel within the US', '
', 'Experience with using analytics and metrics and deriving insights from them using appropriate statistical methods', '
', '
', 'Key Responsibilities:', '
', '
', 'Work with key stakeholders in analyzing requirements against existing product solution functionality to drive out gaps and define new requirements based on technical constraints.', '
', 'Documentation of critical information shared during strategy, design, development, and release meetings.', '
', 'Capture and author user stories, user scenarios and use cases that accurately reflect business requirements.', '
', 'Work closely and collaborate with UI/UX design team to conceptualize requirements, turning high level requirements into wireframes, prototypes, final designs and assets.', '
', 'Experience in usability testing and project management', '
', 'Experience in creating, maintaining, and communication of product roadmaps', '
', 'Excellent presentation skills', '
', 'Experience with the Agile project management process', '
', '
So if this all sounds like you....great! Please apply and let us know what makes you our next great hire. We are a thriving Community of top technology talent that is globally connected. We Engage, Make, Run and Evolve the technology that makes many brands that you know and love. So let’s take this journey together. No matter where you are on your digital career roadmap, we can help you grow and have fun doing it. Thanks for your interest.
', '
Momentus / Softvision LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. No 3rd Party Agency Candidates.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Aerotek is a leading provider of professional and technical personnel services in North America, in partnership with leading companies and experts from all sectors.', '
Aerotek has currently job opportunities as Business Analyst for its client BOMBARDIER', '
', '
In your role, you will:', '
Create and maintain standard governance packages;', '
Analyze business reporting and perform root cause analysis;', '
Control customer facing action registers and implement solutions;', '
Participate in process improvement projects;', '
Lead and participate in presentations', '
Collaborate with small project teams;', '
Review detailed plans & metrics with senior management, as required;', '
Interact with different hierarchical levels of Bombardier Aerospace;', '
Prepare and lead communications based on the target audience;', '
', '
', '
As our ideal candidate,', '
You have a Bachelor degree', '
You have an excellent knowledge of French and English, written and spoken;', '
You have a good knowledge with MS Office (Project, Visio, Excel and PowerPoint);', '
You have excellent computer skills to operate word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, databases and, project management software.
', 'You have strong access database skills which is critical for you to assume responsibility of existing tools and create new tools judiciously', '
You have knowledge of SAP (asset)', '
You are a team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills', '
You have a strong work ethic and are willing to take initiative;', '
You know how to meet tight deadlines;', '
You are able to multi-task under a highly demanding and continuously changing environment;', '
You are able to work under pressure', '
You are flexible in your work hours', '
Some business travel will be required to support special project initiatives.', '
', '
', '
', "À propos d'Aerotek:", '
', '
', '
', "Notre monde nous tient à cœur. Reconnu Best of StaffingMD par nos clients et le talent que nous recrutons, AerotekMD Inc. se distingue comme chef de file du recrutement et en de la dotation de personnel grâce à sa grande compréhension des liens entre le talent et les affaires. Étant donné qu'Aerotek est un partenaire stratégique de plus de 18 000 clients et 300 000 employés contractuels chaque année, son approche axée sur les gens lui permet d'offrir un avantage concurrentiel à ses clients et des emplois gratifiants à ses employés contractuels. Aerotek, dont le siège social est à Hanover, au Maryland, exploite un réseau de plus de 250 bureaux non franchisés, comptant plus de 8 000 employés internes dévoués à servir nos clients. Aerotek est une société en exploitation d'Allegis Group, un fournisseur multinational de solutions en matière de talent. Pour en savoir davantage, consultez le site aerotek.com/fr-ca."]

You know how to meet tight deadlines;', '
You are able to multi-task under a highly demanding and continuously changing environment;', '
You are able to work under pressure', '
You are flexible in your work hours', '
Some business travel will be required to support special project initiatives.', '
', '
', '
', "À propos d'Aerotek:", '
', '
', '
', "Notre monde nous tient à cœur. Reconnu Best of StaffingMD par nos clients et le talent que nous recrutons, AerotekMD Inc. se distingue comme chef de file du recrutement et en de la dotation de personnel grâce à sa grande compréhension des liens entre le talent et les affaires. Étant donné qu'Aerotek est un partenaire stratégique de plus de 18 000 clients et 300 000 employés contractuels chaque année, son approche axée sur les gens lui permet d'offrir un avantage concurrentiel à ses clients et des emplois gratifiants à ses employés contractuels. Aerotek, dont le siège social est à Hanover, au Maryland, exploite un réseau de plus de 250 bureaux non franchisés, comptant plus de 8 000 employés internes dévoués à servir nos clients. Aerotek est une société en exploitation d'Allegis Group, un fournisseur multinational de solutions en matière de talent. Pour en savoir davantage, consultez le site aerotek.com/fr-ca."

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['New Value Solutions, a national IT consulting company, is searching for a Business Analyst to engage with a variety of stakeholders to review a key service.', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Conduct analysis of current state', 'Identification of issues and challenges from those stakeholder groups offering service provision.', 'Conduct interviews', 'Create workflow diagrams and reports', 'Requirements: ', 'Experience conducting interviews and/or focus groups with a variety of types of stakeholder groups, with varying levels of seniority.', 'Experience in health care and experience working directly with, or for, physicians.', 'Experience creating workflow diagrams and reports, and presenting report findings', 'If you have this expertise and are able to work in Canada, please apply. We thank all candidates but only those shortlisted will be contacted.', 'Job Types: Full-time, Contract', 'Experience:', 'business analysis: 3 years (Preferred)', 'conducting interviews for analysis review: 3 years (Preferred)', 'working in health care: 3 years (Preferred)', 'Location:', 'Vancouver, BC (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['This role involves research, analysis of the business needs, prototyping new procedures for the purpose of enhancing business processes, operations, and information process flow.', 'Responsibilities include: ', 'Work with various Business groups in the organization to gather, analyze, evaluate suitability, define, document and validate business requirements', 'Proactively identify opportunities for improvement by incorporating the latest technology developments, trends and innovations', 'Work collaboratively with the team to meet business requirements', 'Develop and maintain documentation for processes, policies, configuration, standard operating procedures', 'Develop end user training materials and deliver training when required', 'Provide business support and troubleshooting assistance for production issues', 'Specific skill requirements: ', 'College diploma or university degree in the field of business administration, information system and/or 2+ years relevant work experience', 'Proven experience with business and technical requirements analysis', 'Competencies in the following are essential: ', 'Excellent analytical, critical-thinking, and creative problem-solving skills', 'Excellent listening, interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills', 'Logical and efficient, with keen attention to detail', 'Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks while under pressure', 'Excellent self-managing skills, including initiative, time management, organization and accountability', 'Strong Customer Service orientation', 'Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment', 'Benefits:', 'Vacation & paid time off', 'Work from home opportunities', 'Onsite Gym', 'Flexible working hours', '**DUE TO THE DEVELOPING IMPACT OF COVID-19, OUR AVERAGE RESPONSE WILL BE LONGER THAN NORMAL. HOWEVER WE STILL WELCOME AND LOOK FORWARD TO REVIEWING NEW APPLICATIONS', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Salary: $52,000.00 to $72,000.00 /year', 'Experience:', 'Business Analyst: 2 years (Required)', 'Location:', 'Toronto, ON (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['ADDATech is a well-established IT company specializing in clinic management software for the paramedical service industry. We’re searching for an experienced business analyst to help guide our organization into the future. With our commitment to innovation, it’s our business analysts who seek out, develop, and help implement strategic initiatives for improved efficiency and productivity. Our business analysts are the drivers behind our continued growth and success.', 'Responsibilities', 'Gather requirements from clients (internal and external)', 'Develop relationships with clients to define the product requirements to optimize our products', 'Document business requirements and operational needs and identify gaps', 'Define and document functional solutions and revise them with the product owner and development team', 'Define or modify processes using process modeling techniques', 'Define/update the functional and/or technical specifications', 'Work closely with QA team to establish test requirements', 'Follow up with various parties (customer service, development team, QA) regarding the changes made', 'Interface with customer service team to keep them informed on product evolution', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Bachelor’s or master’s degree in IT or Computer Science', '5+ years of proven experience in an analytics and systems development capacity', 'Practical experience generating process documentation', 'Excellent communicator with the ability to translate data into actionable insights', 'Ability to understand and use current computer technology', 'Ability to quickly understand and systematize technical concepts', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Strong working knowledge of relevant Microsoft applications, including Visio', 'Proven capabilities in project and user-testing management', 'Highly proficient technical writing capabilities', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Experience:', 'business analysis: 3 years (Required)', 'Education:', "Bachelor's Degree (Required)", 'Location:', 'Laval, QC (Preferred)', 'Language:', 'English (Required)', 'French (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['The Opportunity', 'SkyHive is looking for an enthusiastic ', 'Business Analyst (BA) ', 'to own the Discovery phase of engaging with Enterprise clients. The BA will solicit, understand, assess, and document the business requirements, processes and reporting needs. They will be required to partner effectively and professionally with all levels of an organization, and proactively identify opportunities, scope problems and co-create potential solutions with the customer. It is also crucial that the BA be skilled at connecting with various personalities, managing expectations (especially from detractors), and adapting stakeholders’ preferred project management methods to SkyHive’s agile philosophy and working style.', 'The Role', 'Lead the initial “discovery phase” with Enterprise-level stakeholders and other subject matter experts; preparation in the form of exhaustive research and efficient synthesis is key', 'Be very well-versed in the SkyHive technology; articulating its values and how Enterprises could leverage its capabilities to redesign and upgrade their search and acquisition of human capital', 'Provide expertise through performing gap analysis and understanding of business goals and needs, while applying relevant processes and practices and abiding by established KPIs', 'Use appropriate tools and techniques to elicit, define and analyze requirements', 'Gather critical information from formal meetings and workshops, produce useful minutes and reports, and contribute to data-driven business decisions', 'Build rapport and develop genuine relationships with customers and effectively communicate insights and plans to cross-functional team members and both technical and non-technical audiences', 'Assist with refining overall strategies, prioritizing tasks, and other business development duties as needed', 'Stay up-to-date with industry trends, as well as consolidating lessons learned to encourage further growth within SkyHive’s fast-paced and dynamic environment', 'Who are you?', 'Qualifications (Must haves)', 'A min of 3 years of experience with SaaS and software integration is a must.', 'Exceptional written and verbal communication skills including excellent documentation skills', 'Highly organized, independent and detail-oriented self-starter', 'Experience writing user stories and use cases and following product releases through to completion', 'Comfortable dealing with and responding to ambiguous situations and being aware of when and how to pivot', 'Strong analytical skills and experience eliciting and creating requirements documents', 'Ability to communicate with people of various technical and business backgrounds, including the ability to explain difficult technical concepts in simple terms to business users', 'A strong team player eager to collaborate, humbly accept feedback and objectively consider multiple perspectives while always empowering the customer’s voice', 'Ability to be resourceful, creative and emotionally intelligent', 'Passion for conducting research and extracting insights', 'Working experience with wireframing and process flow diagrams', 'Nice-to-Haves', 'Software background', 'University degree, diploma or certificate in Information Technology or equivalent experience', '3+ years of work experience in a business setting', 'Experience with project management', 'Understanding of UX principles and best practices', 'Who are we?', 'As a Portfolio Company of Singularity University and voted one of BC’s top 50 tech startups by the #BCTECH Summit, SkyHive applies competency-based methodology with advanced technologies to drive unprecedented efficiency in strategic workforce planning and human capital movement.', 'With the mission of tackling global poverty and social inequality, SkyHive aims to utilize its exponential technologies to facilitate labour market transformation and foster a stronger, more prepared, and more confident workforce to welcome a brighter tomorrow.', 'What do we offer?', 'Opportunity to get your foot in the door of a fast-growing tech company', 'Collaborative team environment and culture', 'Comprehensive health benefits package - We pay for this, nothing comes off your cheque.', 'Three weeks’ paid vacation to start, paid holidays and birthday leave!', 'Stock options & gainsharing plan', 'Certified B-Corporation', 'Paid & unpaid volunteer time off', 'Charitable donation-matching program to support your favorite charity.', 'Opportunity to explore other departments as training and career continues.', 'Professional development assistance program that covers professional continuing education', 'Beautiful office in A1 location (Views, Views, Views)', 'Numerous employee appreciation events throughout the year', 'How to apply', 'Please apply on our website at https://www.skyhive.io/en-ca/offer/5e5994d0179492508032b7be', 'We thank everyone for their interest however, only candidates who apply through SkyHive will be contacted.', 'Benefits:', 'Extended health care', 'Vision care', 'Vacation & paid time off', 'Life insurance', 'Flexible working hours', 'Work from home opportunities', 'Company events & social hours', 'Employee stock purchase plan', 'Dental care', 'Casual dress', 'Disability insurance', 'Bonus scheme', 'On-site parking', 'Onsite Gym', 'Education reimbursement', 'Job Types: Full-time, Permanent', 'Salary: $65,000.00 to $85,000.00 /year', 'Experience:', 'software integration: 3 years (Preferred)', 'SaaS: 3 years (Preferred)', 'External facing BA: 3 years (Preferred)', 'Software Development: 3 years (Preferred)', 'Location:', JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Aerotek is a leading provider of professional and technical personnel services in North America, in partnership with leading companies and experts from all sectors.', '
Aerotek has currently job opportunities as Business Analyst for its client BOMBARDIER', '
', '
In your role, you will:', '
Create and maintain standard governance packages;', '
Analyze business reporting and perform root cause analysis;', '
Control customer facing action registers and implement solutions;', '
Participate in process improvement projects;', '
Lead and participate in presentations', '
Collaborate with small project teams;', '
Review detailed plans & metrics with senior management, as required;', '
Interact with different hierarchical levels of Bombardier Aerospace;', '
Prepare and lead communications based on the target audience;', '
', '
', '
As our ideal candidate,', '
You have a Bachelor degree', '
You have an excellent knowledge of French and English, written and spoken;', '
You have a good knowledge with MS Office (Project, Visio, Excel and PowerPoint);', '

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Come and join a successful, relational and passionate company dedicated to individual growth, ethical treatment, and a healthy work/life balance. Our core values contribute to increased productivity, employee retention and strong internal team support. This translates to the enhanced ability to delivery specialized solutions to our diverse customer base. Work Smarter, work safer, work Sandalwood!', '
', '
', '
', 'The successful candidate for Business Analyst will join a growing team of dedicated professionals helping our customers reduce their work-related risk to quality, productivity and employee health.', '
', '
CORE RESPONSIBILITIES', '
', '
', 'Facilitating current state business process reviews with client subject matter experts.', '
', 'Creating activity diagrams and use case documentation for current state business processes.', '
', 'Following all client standards and best practices for process mapping documentation.', '
', 'Continually looking for ways to improve efficiency through development of tools and methods.', '
', 'Utilizing good project management practices and ensuring clear communication to clients and management.', '
', 'Up to 50% travel to client sites across Canada and the United States.', '
', '
', 'Requirements', '
', 'A bachelor’s degree in business, engineering or related field or an MBA.', '
', 'A minimum of 3 years process mapping experience in an industrial environment (manufacturing, food & beverage, etc.)', '
', 'Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills.', '
', 'Strong facilitation skills.', '
', 'Excellent documentation skills including ability to capture detailed information quickly and accurately.', '
', 'Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations.', '
', 'Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, Visio and Outlook.', '
', 'Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills.', '
', 'A track record of following through on commitments.', '
', '
', 'Sandalwood is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', '
Benefits', '
', 'Health Care Plan (Medical, Dental & Vision)', '
', 'Retirement Plan (RRSP)', '
', 'Life Insurance (Basic, Voluntary & AD&D)', '
', 'Paid Time Off (Vacation & Public Holidays)', '
', 'Short Term & Long Term Disability', '
', 'Training & Development']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Attain Solutions is a leading provider of ERP applications and technology services. Based in Western Canada, our company provides the full spectrum of large scale business applications consulting to our public sector and government clients. Our mission is to provide cost-effective, sustainable solutions that realize the true value of enterprise applications.', 'Our Vancouver and Edmonton offices are looking for full-time permanent Business Systems Analysts to join our growing solutions delivery team.', 'As a Business Analyst you will demonstrate your expertise day to day in support, analysis, solutions delivery, and project work for PeopleSoft applications and other related ERP software. Your experience with different PeopleSoft modules and your deep understanding of related business processes will provide leadership and guidance to a number of clients.', 'We need people who are versatile in a number of different technologies, enjoy complex problem solving and have a strong sense of ownership and commitment to the end-user.', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Provide essential troubleshooting and support to end-users in a timely manner with a focus on an exceptional customer experience.', "Analyzing, interpreting and translating client's business requirements into viable solutions.", "Providing specialist advice on the design of the system from the client's business perspective.", 'Participating in the development of the criteria, scenarios, and scripts for system testing.', 'Coordinating user acceptance testing.', 'Clarifying functional requirements and resolving implementation issues.', 'Assisting application developers and technical support staff in identifying and resolving problems.', 'Prepare and conduct user training.', 'Serve as the organizational liaison with the user community.', 'Communicate and work directly with manager/team leads to estimate development complexity and timelines.', 'Desired Skills & Qualifications: ', 'Detailed knowledge of full cycle of the specific application and related business processes.', 'Previous experience with an ERP product (PeopleSoft preferred but not required).', 'A professional designation is a plus but not required.', 'Ability to balance multiple demands and work both independently and as part of a team.', 'Professionalism in dealing with all levels of management and staff both internally and externally.', 'Demonstrate a positive and professional attitude, personal integrity, strong problem solving ability and analytical skills.', 'Demonstrate organizational skills, high standards of accuracy, attention to detail and excellent follow-up skills.', 'Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Visio, Project) tools.', 'Ability to learn and assimilate information quickly.', 'Ability to break down business problems into logical tasks.', 'Ability to think creatively.', 'Ability to lead meetings.', 'Demonstrate ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, high volume, deadline-driven environment.', 'Exceptional service orientation, responsiveness and follow-through.', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Essentials: ', "We look for the same strand of DNA in all our employees: a curious self-starter that believes in a greater purpose. Someone that values integrity, honesty, and respect. Work is not just 8 hours set aside to earn dollars; you're on a mission for something greater. Whether it's to improve your family's life, or the community you live in, we value people that know the meaning of sowing into a vision. You help us achieve our vision and our clients' goals, and we help you live out yours.", 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Experience:', 'business analyst: 1 year (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['We have a position available for a', ' Business Analyst ', 'in our IT department located in Regina.', '
', '
', '
The Business Analyst is responsible for creating and maintaining business process documents, creating test scripts and conducting initial testing. The Business Analyst is also responsible for coordinating end user tests and obtaining Business Process Sign Off for new and or changed business processes in the production system. Business Analysts work closely with Subject Matter Experts in various disciplines, IT staff and Project Managers. Travel may be required.', '
Required Skills', '
', '
Required Experience', '
', 'The ideal candidate will have 3 years of experience in a Business or System Analyst role. Excellent presentation, written and oral communication skills are required. IIBA certification or equivalent, accompanied with experience in a Sales & Marketing, Manufacturing, Distribution, Supply Chain, After Sales Support, Logistics, Parts, Service or Finance industry is considered an asset.']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Communauto, the world leader in carsharing, is developing a carsharing fleet management software, thanks to its subsidiary Reservauto Inc. In constant evolution towards advanced technologies (Cloud, IoT, .Net Core) the challenges are stimulating. Join a dynamic and high-skilled team in a pleasant working environment where camaraderie reigns.', 'Reporting to the Analysis and Support Manager, the main role of the IT business analyst is to analyze the business needs of the company, to model the processes in order to develop an IT solution adapted to customer needs, be a subject matter expert in all things pertaining to the solution. The ideal candidate for this position possesses excellent attention to details, natural leadership, ability to work great in a team and independently, and is always ready to innovate and question our ways of doing things.', 'MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Define business requirements by eliciting needs and modeling business processes', 'Design concrete solutions addressing customer needs, advise and assist them in a perspective of innovation and constant improvement.', 'Document the analysis and possible solutions, provide proposals and collaborate with stakeholders and the other business analysts', 'Present business requirements, operational and functional requirements to IT development teams', 'Produce conceptual documentation, document business rules and produce documentation for users', 'Participate in quality control activities', 'Participate in the integration of the system with new customers, performs operational follow-up with them following the integration', 'Offer 2nd level technical support during incidents and on rotation', 'REQUIREMENTS (qualification, experience, skills)', 'Fully bilingual, French and English, written and spoken', 'Master the methods of business process analysis (UML, BPMN, etc.)', 'Have excellent writing skills', 'Ability to interact with clients and colleagues and build lasting relationships', 'Be able to lead a meeting in collaborative mode', 'Know the concepts and principles of strategic planning', 'Know the concepts and techniques of data modeling', 'Know and masters concepts and techniques of project management', '3 to 5 years experience in business analysis or management information system', 'Technical knowledge - required', '· Applications: MS Office Suite', 'Technical knowledge - an asset', '· Operating system: Windows', '· Application software: Visual Studio', '· Languages: SQL, XML, other languages an asset', '· Tools: Jira, Confluence, modeling tools (Visio, Lucidchart, Axure)', 'PERSONAL QUALIFICATIONS REQUIRED', 'Ability to communicate effectively orally and in writing', 'Ability to analyze and synthesize', 'Ability to influence, convince and initiate required changes', 'Listening and interpersonal skills', 'Customer approach focused on action and results', 'Quickness in solving problems or situations', 'Ability to work in a team, but also to be autonomous at times, able to reach out when needed', 'Sense of initiative', 'Thoroughness, rigor', 'Sense of responsibility', 'LOCATION', 'Edmonton, downtown, ICE district', 'ADVANTAGES & CONDITIONS', 'Full time position, 5 days a week, approximately 37.5 hours', 'Time range: 9 am-5pm (flexible)', 'Occasional telework possible', 'Paid training program', 'Benefit: group insurance program with employer contributions (health, dental and optical), discounts on our Communauto offers and on the public transport subscription', 'Equipment provided: Ultraportable computer, dual monitors and smartphone (upon probation completion)', 'Job Types: Full-time, Permanent']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
["You have a knack for data and understand how numbers impact the business. You thrive on speedily reacting to change and enjoy the fluctuations that are thrown at you with a moment's notice. We're looking for a Business Analyst with an inquisitive mind who enjoys digging deeper to find solutions.", '
The Business Analyst will be responsible for developing and interpreting financial models, developing reporting for internal and external communications, and performing various analyses as required to support different departments. The Business Analyst will also participate in monthly financial and operational meetings and the annual budgeting process.', '
RESPONSIBILITIES', '
Supporting operations by performing regular and ad hoc analysis of operations, process, and financial performance', '
Reviewing data quality and reporting on data trends', '
Conduct regular research on best practices and utilize information to build datasets as required to run different analyses and provide insights to senior management', '
Contributing to the development of analysis to deepen the understanding of business trends.', '
Assisting in the development of monthly, quarterly, and annual operational and financial reports', '
Analyzing cost centre detail and explaining variances', '
Assisting in the biannual budget process', '
Supporting operations by performing regular and ad hoc analysis of operating budget', '
Preparing monthly and year-to-date financial reports for distribution to management', "
Contribute to ongoing development and monitoring of portfolio wide KPI's", '
Build quantitative modeling and reporting to help optimize internal processes', '
REQUIREMENTS', '
Post-secondary education in accounting or finance', '
Minimum 2 years combined experience in financial analysis or business analyst role', '
Demonstrated knowledge and experience with generating and maintaining complex automated reporting facilities', '
Exceptional critical thinking, analytical and advanced problem-solving skills', '
Great attention to detail and a keen eye for quantitative and qualitative anomalies', '
Demonstrated success in working effectively both independently and as part of a team', '
Ability to prioritize and complete a variety of incoming tasks with varied deadline', '
Desired skills include Excel, SQL, PowerBI, understanding and use of relational databases', '
BENEFITS', '
Employer paid medical, dental, and vision coverage', '
$170 yearly fitness benefit', '
Registered Pension Plan', '
Breakfast and Lunch provided daily', '
oy1cAVfBVo']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Take the Next Step in Your Business System Analysis Career!', '
As a proven leader in the delivery of comprehensive offender management solutions, Abilis is the fastest growing company in its sector. Our award-winning CORIS® Product Family has captured the attention of corrections professionals around the world as they seek to improve operational efficiency and offender outcomes, as well as help offenders to reenter the community with the best possible chances of success. We are seeking an energetic Business System Analyst to help drive and solidify our growth. We want your ideas, your creativity, your innovation and your teamwork to help us achieve our objectives.', '
', '
As a Business System Analyst, this is your opportunity to work in a unique and compelling industry. We provide a stimulating environment where you can enhance your skills in a challenging environment and will be given the opportunity to grow. From our headquarters in Montreal and with visits to the client, you will have a direct impact on our customer satisfaction. You will identify, analyze and translate business needs into functional specifications. You will be an important link between the clients-users and other teams (e.g., product owners, developers, architects, QA, training). You will be working on a web-based software product for the correctional industry, specifically on detailing screens of a web interface.', '
', '
Abilis is passionate about solving problems with technology, and here you will find a dynamic, diverse and lively work environment that is far from monotonous and routine!', '
', '
Why should you join Abilis Solutions? Good question! We asked our employees and this is what they said.', '
', 'Great work environment', '
', 'Focus on a work-life balance', '
', 'Fascinating industry (correctional domain)', '
', 'Strong customer focus', '
', 'Career growth', '
', 'Amazing people – very multicultural', '
', 'Complex and innovative product', '
', 'Competitive salary and benefits', '
', 'Beautiful office - downtown location', '
', 'What will you be working on?', '
', 'Conducting research and analysis of business requirements; understanding business issues and the challenges of the industry', '
', 'Ability to facilitate sessions with large group', '
', 'You will be accountable for gathering, managing and analyzing requirements', '
', 'Analyzing and documenting customer needs and business process in collaboration with product owners', '
', 'Reviewing and editing requirements, specifications, processes and recommendations related to a proposed solution', '
', 'Working with the team and client, you will define scope; identify, create, update uses cases and workflows, and provide functional specifications', '
', 'Maintaining consistency between the client’s needs and the proposed technical solutions', '
', 'Understanding technical solutions and evaluating their functional impacts', '
', 'Taking the initiative to resolve assigned issues efficiently', '
', 'The Analyst is expected to quickly and comprehensively evolve their understanding of the domain', '
', 'You will be successful here if you have:', '
', 'A positive “Can Do” attitude and an aptitude to learn quickly and ask the right questions', '
', 'An eye for detail', '
', 'A Bachelor’s degree IT or MIS related or equivalent is great but not a showstopper', '
', '5-8 years in a similar role', '
', 'The ability to create positive and professional business relationships with clients', '
', 'Solid experience with business modeling, functional analysis/design and documentation (functional specifications, use cases, activity diagrams, flowcharts, business rules)', '
', 'The ability to clearly present ideas and information in group settings', '
', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', '
', 'French is an asset', '
', '-', '
', '
Passez à l’étape suivante de votre carrière d’analyste d’affaires - systèmes', '
', '
', 'En qualité de chef de file ayant fait ses preuves dans l’offre de solutions intégrées de gestion des contrevenants, Abilis est la société qui connaît la croissance la plus rapide dans son secteur. Notre suite de produits CORIS® a attiré l’attention des professionnels des services correctionnels du monde entier qui cherchent à améliorer l’efficacité opérationnelle des agences correctionnelles, tout en aidant les contrevenants à réintégrer la société en leur offrant les meilleures chances de réussite possibles.', '
', '
', 'Nous recherchons un analyste d’affaires - systèmes énergique qui contribuera à dynamiser et à renforcer notre croissance. Nous voulons que ses idées, sa créativité, son innovation et son travail d’équipe contribuent à l’atteinte de nos objectifs.', '
En tant qu’analyste d’affaires - systèmes, vous aurez l’occasion de travailler dans un secteur unique et fascinant. Nous offrons un environnement stimulant où vous pourrez améliorer vos compétences, relever des défis, et où vous aurez l’occasion de faire progresser votre carrière. De notre magnifique siège social situé à Montréal et lors des visites chez le client, vous aurez un impact direct sur la satisfaction de nos clients.', '
', '
', '

CLUSTER JOB:
Take the Next Step in Your Business System Analysis Career!', '
As a proven leader in the delivery of comprehensive offender management solutions, Abilis is the fastest growing company in its sector. Our award-winning CORIS® Product Family has captured the attention of corrections professionals around the world as they seek to improve operational efficiency and offender outcomes, as well as help offenders to reenter the community with the best possible chances of success. We are seeking an energetic Business System Analyst to help drive and solidify our growth. We want your ideas, your creativity, your innovation and your teamwork to help us achieve our objectives.', '
', '
As a Business System Analyst, this is your opportunity to work in a unique and compelling industry. We provide a stimulating environment where you can enhance your skills in a challenging environment and will be given the opportunity to grow. From our headquarters in Montreal and with visits to the client, you will have a direct impact on our customer satisfaction. You will identify, analyze and translate business needs into functional specifications. You will be an important link between the clients-users and other teams (e.g., product owners, developers, architects, QA, training). You will be working on a web-based software product for the correctional industry, specifically on detailing screens of a web interface.', '
', '
Abilis is passionate about solving problems with technology, and here you will find a dynamic, diverse and lively work environment that is far from monotonous and routine!', '
', '
Why should you join Abilis Solutions? Good question! We asked our employees and this is what they said.', '
', 'Great work environment', '
', 'Focus on a work-life balance', '
', 'Fascinating industry (correctional domain)', '
', 'Strong customer focus', '
', 'Career growth', '
', 'Amazing people – very multicultural', '
', 'Complex and innovative product', '
', 'Competitive salary and benefits', '
', 'Beautiful office - downtown location', '
', 'What will you be working on?', '
', 'Conducting research and analysis of business requirements; understanding business issues and the challenges of the industry', '
', 'Ability to facilitate sessions with large group', '
', 'You will be accountable for gathering, managing and analyzing requirements', '
', 'Analyzing and documenting customer needs and business process in collaboration with product owners', '
', 'Reviewing and editing requirements, specifications, processes and recommendations related to a proposed solution', '
', 'Working with the team and client, you will define scope; identify, create, update uses cases and workflows, and provide functional specifications', '
', 'Maintaining consistency between the client’s needs and the proposed technical solutions', '
', 'Understanding technical solutions and evaluating their functional impacts', '
', 'Taking the initiative to resolve assigned issues efficiently', '
', 'The Analyst is expected to quickly and comprehensively evolve their understanding of the domain', '
', 'You will be successful here if you have:', '
', 'A positive “Can Do” attitude and an aptitude to learn quickly and ask the right questions', '
', 'An eye for detail', '
', 'A Bachelor’s degree IT or MIS related or equivalent is great but not a showstopper', '
', '5-8 years in a similar role', '
', 'The ability to create positive and professional business relationships with clients', '
', 'Solid experience with business modeling, functional analysis/design and documentation (functional specifications, use cases, activity diagrams, flowcharts, business rules)', '
', 'The ability to clearly present ideas and information in group settings', '
', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', '
', 'French is an asset', '
', '-', '
', '
Passez à l’étape suivante de votre carrière d’analyste d’affaires - systèmes', '
', '
', 'En qualité de chef de file ayant fait ses preuves dans l’offre de solutions intégrées de gestion des contrevenants, Abilis est la société qui connaît la croissance la plus rapide dans son secteur. Notre suite de produits CORIS® a attiré l’attention des professionnels des services correctionnels du monde entier qui cherchent à améliorer l’efficacité opérationnelle des agences correctionnelles, tout en aidant les contrevenants à réintégrer la société en leur offrant les meilleures chances de réussite possibles.', '
', '
', 'Nous recherchons un analyste d’affaires - systèmes énergique qui contribuera à dynamiser et à renforcer notre croissance. Nous voulons que ses idées, sa créativité, son innovation et son travail d’équipe contribuent à l’atteinte de nos objectifs.', '
En tant qu’analyste d’affaires - systèmes, vous aurez l’occasion de travailler dans un secteur unique et fascinant. Nous offrons un environnement stimulant où vous pourrez améliorer vos compétences, relever des défis, et où vous aurez l’occasion de faire progresser votre carrière. De notre magnifique siège social situé à Montréal et lors des visites chez le client, vous aurez un impact direct sur la satisfaction de nos clients.', '
', '
', '

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['What’s in it for you?', '
Join a dynamic team driven by the success of the client.', '
A comprehensive salary and benefits package.', '
Support one of the biggest names in the consumer electronics industry.', '
What will you do?', '
Leverage existing systems and field data to provide regular reporting and analytics on the state of the business.', '
Provide in-depth data analysis of strengths/weaknesses in current execution of retail strategies.', '
Analyze environmental and competitive activity and recommend aggressive strategy tactics to stay viable and grow in the category space.', '
Serve as a point of influence for the client and effectively communicate performance measurements and impact of initiatives.', '
Present data to client and all levels of management and gain buy-in based on credibility of analytics.', '
Manage intelligence requests from a variety of sources with varying timelines.', '
Synthesize information into actionable recommendations for management and/or clients.', '
Use statistical analysis of results to identify impact with verification through use of internal and external sources.', '
Develop Key Performance Indicator (KPI) strategies for field execution and/or account management based on analytics.', '
Compile data into professional reports that support both findings and recommendations quantitatively and qualitatively.', '
How will you succeed?', '
Having comprehensive and clear understanding of retail environments and consumer insights to utilize when recommending effective in-market strategies.', '
Clearly articulating compelling business insights and actions with data and context.', '
By delivering sound performance analysis and recommendations.', '
What experience should you have?', '
Scripting languages (Python) required.', '
Statistical analysis software (SAS) and data mining software (SPSS) a plus.', '
High performance proficiency with SQL based data query languages required.', '
High proficiency and experience using Sisense, PowerBI, Tableau (or other Business Intelligence tools) required.', '
Experience in the mobile communications industry a plus.', '
Bachelor’s Degree required. Master’s Degree highly desirable.', '
', '
So, are you Premium’s next Business Analyst?', '
', '
#WeArePremium']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Job Description', 'Are you able to able to proactively drive work forward, even in the face of ambiguity or limited information, while others are paralyzed by having too many options or not knowing where to start? Are you zealous in your preparation and learning, always actively looking to improve upon existing ideas and methods? Are you highly competent in building relationships and credibility through action and delivery? At Norima, our people collaboratively tackle the most difficult technology challenges and never hesitate to put in the time needed to comprehensively grind a problem. If you have an emotional attachment to your work, are naturally inclined to think beyond the direct boundaries of a specific problem and enjoy collaboratively helping to identify the path to deliver value, we’d like to have a chat.', 'Norima, a technology consulting company that prides itself on its ability to deliver results in the most complex and challenging business environments is in need of experienced Business Analysts with functional and technical expertise to join one of our key delivery teams. We are looking for candidates with exemplary character, consistency and competence to join a growing team of professionals who share a passion for solving complex problems with technology-based solutions. Ideally you have:', 'Completed a university degree or college diploma;', 'A minimum of five (5) years proven working experience in information technologies;', 'Exceptional communications and elicitation skills; and', 'Knowledge and experience in the IIBA BA Body of Knowledge (BABOK);', '\ufeffThis role is located in Winnipeg - relocation is required', 'Overall Qualifications', 'Norima is a fast-paced, entrepreneurial company, looking to hire the best, brightest, and hardest working consultants onto our high-calibre team. As the ideal candidate, you:', 'Are client delivery focused, and committed to working as a flexible extension to our clients to earn a place as their trusted advisor;', 'Possess superior written and verbal communication skills;', 'Have a natural curiosity towards gaining new understanding and broadening your knowledge base;', 'Are skilled in managing and prioritizing multiple projects and competing deadlines; and', 'Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills;', 'Are practiced in conducting market research and business case development.', 'Additional Technical Requirements', 'Experience facilitating working sessions for requirements discovery, for problem investigation, to gain group consensus, and/or to aid decision making;', 'The ability to model, abstract, and simplify complex concepts so that they can be understood by a variety of stakeholders;', 'Practiced in documenting use cases and associated processes, including data modeling, functional specification modeling and process modeling;', 'Comfortable developing clear, concise and detailed documentation, including functional and non-functional specifications;', 'Effective communication of requirements and specifications to a variety of audiences, including business users, technical stakeholders and senior leadership;', 'Develop training material to support new processes, systems, roles and responsibilities', 'Proactively manage organizational change through effective stakeholder engagement and communication', 'Implement standards, processes and best practices at any level of an organization', 'Demonstrated ability to analyze and solve technology-related business problems;', 'Experience gathering and developing current and future state documentation; and', 'Strong understanding of the benefits and limitations of various SDLC methodologies (Waterfall & Agile).', 'Why Norima?', 'For over 10 years, Norima Consulting Inc. has been transforming businesses by leveraging the right technology, at the right time, by, and in collaboration with, the right people. Norima has been consistently growing in both size and revenue for over a decade, almost exclusively by word of mouth, and this has only been possible by ensuring that we have been an employer of choice for top professionals who are passionate about demonstrating real results and committed to achieving excellence.', 'Norima works hard to provide a collaborative, rewarding environment and work opportunities that attract and retain top candidates and employees. Norima’s Learning and Growth strategy is to actively invest in professional development and to provide opportunity for progressive work assignments to build experience. Norima is a place where professional growth is actively supported and expected.', 'According to independent employee reviews on Glassdoor.com, 100% would recommend Norima to a friend, and 100% approve of the CEO. Norima has a summary score of 4.9 stars out of 5.0.', 'We offer competitive compensation and benefits, an RRSP matching program, a professional development program, and a positive work environment. This is a great opportunity to be at the heart of a growing company.', 'If you are interested in this position, please respond with a resume and cover letter in PDF and please include the job reference code in your cover letter.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Experience:', 'sql: 1 year (Preferred)']

As the ideal candidate, you:', 'Are client delivery focused, and committed to working as a flexible extension to our clients to earn a place as their trusted advisor;', 'Possess superior written and verbal communication skills;', 'Have a natural curiosity towards gaining new understanding and broadening your knowledge base;', 'Are skilled in managing and prioritizing multiple projects and competing deadlines; and', 'Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills;', 'Are practiced in conducting market research and business case development.', 'Additional Technical Requirements', 'Experience facilitating working sessions for requirements discovery, for problem investigation, to gain group consensus, and/or to aid decision making;', 'The ability to model, abstract, and simplify complex concepts so that they can be understood by a variety of stakeholders;', 'Practiced in documenting use cases and associated processes, including data modeling, functional specification modeling and process modeling;', 'Comfortable developing clear, concise and detailed documentation, including functional and non-functional specifications;', 'Effective communication of requirements and specifications to a variety of audiences, including business users, technical stakeholders and senior leadership;', 'Develop training material to support new processes, systems, roles and responsibilities', 'Proactively manage organizational change through effective stakeholder engagement and communication', 'Implement standards, processes and best practices at any level of an organization', 'Demonstrated ability to analyze and solve technology-related business problems;', 'Experience gathering and developing current and future state documentation; and', 'Strong understanding of the benefits and limitations of various SDLC methodologies (Waterfall & Agile).', 'Why Norima?', 'For over 10 years, Norima Consulting Inc. has been transforming businesses by leveraging the right technology, at the right time, by, and in collaboration with, the right people. Norima has been consistently growing in both size and revenue for over a decade, almost exclusively by word of mouth, and this has only been possible by ensuring that we have been an employer of choice for top professionals who are passionate about demonstrating real results and committed to achieving excellence.', 'Norima works hard to provide a collaborative, rewarding environment and work opportunities that attract and retain top candidates and employees. Norima’s Learning and Growth strategy is to actively invest in professional development and to provide opportunity for progressive work assignments to build experience. Norima is a place where professional growth is actively supported and expected.', 'According to independent employee reviews on Glassdoor.com, 100% would recommend Norima to a friend, and 100% approve of the CEO. Norima has a summary score of 4.9 stars out of 5.0.', 'We offer competitive compensation and benefits, an RRSP matching program, a professional development program, and a positive work environment. This is a great opportunity to be at the heart of a growing company.', 'If you are interested in this position, please respond with a resume and cover letter in PDF and please include the job reference code in your cover letter.', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Experience:', 'sql: 1 year (Preferred)

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['The Opportunity ', 'We’re looking for a self-motivated and passionate individual to join the fast-paced environment as a Business Analyst with the Digital Solutions Team at Pollard Banknote.', 'In this role, you will be responsible for working with many different internal and external teams to gather requirements and manage the effective planning and lifecycle management of digital solutions for the lottery industry.', 'As a Business Analyst, you will maintain product backlog, create a product roadmap, direct the project team and assist in systems analysis. Product planning responsibilities include awareness and analysis of systems and operational needs and translates them to product requirements and roadmap, and ensure the team has the tools and the expertise to deliver the product.', 'Key Responsibilities', '*', 'Liaise with business and development teams to facilitate the development of new digital products and enhance existing products', 'Perform System Analysis and deliver technical solutions to address system break-fix and change requests as part of deliverables', 'Work with the Product Director and other internal and external stakeholders to prioritize and maintain the product backlog and roadmap', 'Coordinate initiatives for small to medium projects, including, identifying, tracking and resolving technical issues for assigned business application systems', 'Solicit goals and requirements (functional and non-functional) through interviews, workshops, and reviews of existing documentation/procedures', 'Ensuring analysis is sufficiently on track and in front of development far enough to ensure the next successful iteration', 'Assist in validating test plans and building test cases', 'Apply an excellent understanding of SDLC, including how it relates to the various software development methodologies and processes (e.g., Agile, RUP, Waterfall, Scrum) to deliver functionality', 'Authoring and completing refined and measurable user stories to ensure comprehension of stories by Project Team members, including the review of any applicable wireframe mockups, tasks required to complete the user story, and relevant acceptance criteria.', 'Provide thought leadership in business and system analysis approaches', 'Participate and facilitate (as required) in product owner, sprint planning, daily scrum and retrospective meetings.', 'Qualifications', 'Post-secondary education in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Business Analysis, or equivalent combination of education and experience', 'Minimum 5 years’ experience in Systems or Business Analysis in an Agile environment', 'Knowledge of technology trends across the industry and best practices within the Software Development Life Cycles (SDLC)', 'Experience with Agile Methodologies, inclusive of Scrum/Iterations, incremental releases, user stories, and Kanban technique', 'Familiarity with Atlassian tools (Bitbucket, Jira, etc.)', 'Familiarity with IT Service Management processes (change, incident, problem and service request).', 'Knowledge of API services', 'Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities within a fast-paced environment and demonstrated a track record of delivering complex solutions on time and budget', 'Ability to apply a high level of problem-solving skills and expertise, with keen attention to detail, to analyze and report on actions and/or solutions', 'Ability to establish and maintain strong relationships with internal and external clients at all levels', 'Superior written and verbal communication skills', 'Understanding of SQL, XML and JSON is considered an asset', 'Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or Certificate in Agile is considered an asset', 'Pollard Banknote offers a challenging, team-oriented environment, competitive compensation, profit sharing program, company pension and opportunities for professional development. Interested candidates are encouraged to submit a cover letter outlining fit and salary expectations along with a résumé to:', 'Pollard Banknote Limited', '140 Otter Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 0M8', 'www.pollardbanknote.com', 'Pollard Banknote Limited is an equal opportunity employer, committed to maintaining a diverse workforce.', 'We thank all candidates that apply, however only those selected for an interview will be contacted.', 'Employment is contingent upon a satisfactory response from a Criminal Record Search.', 'Job Types: Full-time, Permanent', 'Experience:', 'Business Analysis: 3 years (Required)', 'Agile: 1 year (Preferred)', 'Location:', 'Winnipeg, MB (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['WE ARE A TRANSFORMATIONAL PARTNER
', "
Momentus is an innovation lab in Softvision's Studio Network. We marry design and engineering language in ways that produce impactful and memorable experience journeys. We partner all the way to continuously improve our clients’ digital maturity. Our Studio network brings the optimal combination of skill, scale, and cost for each stage of the product development lifecycle. And to do this we need great transformational people that want to impact the projects and organizations that they work with.
", '
We are looking for an exceptional Business Analyst to work with our cross-functional team, and join our world-class community of talented experts. Core to this need are:
', '
', '
', '2+ years experience as a Business Analyst working with digital design solutions', '
', 'Web and server side software project experience', '
', 'Experience with Agile development', '
', 'Ability to interpret customer needs and apply them to existing or new products', '
', 'Experience working with a technology group in large, complex product development', '
', 'Confidence in communicating with different stakeholders, especially with Senior Management', '
', 'Ability to travel within the US', '
', 'Experience with using analytics and metrics and deriving insights from them using appropriate statistical methods', '
', '
', 'Key Responsibilities:', '
', '
', 'Work with key stakeholders in analyzing requirements against existing product solution functionality to drive out gaps and define new requirements based on technical constraints.', '
', 'Documentation of critical information shared during strategy, design, development, and release meetings.', '
', 'Capture and author user stories, user scenarios and use cases that accurately reflect business requirements.', '
', 'Work closely and collaborate with UI/UX design team to conceptualize requirements, turning high level requirements into wireframes, prototypes, final designs and assets.', '
', 'Experience in usability testing and project management', '
', 'Experience in creating, maintaining, and communication of product roadmaps', '
', 'Excellent presentation skills', '
', 'Experience with the Agile project management process', '
', '
So if this all sounds like you....great! Please apply and let us know what makes you our next great hire. We are a thriving Community of top technology talent that is globally connected. We Engage, Make, Run and Evolve the technology that makes many brands that you know and love. So let’s take this journey together. No matter where you are on your digital career roadmap, we can help you grow and have fun doing it. Thanks for your interest.
', '
Momentus / Softvision LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. No 3rd Party Agency Candidates.']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['Come and join a successful, relational and passionate company dedicated to individual growth, ethical treatment, and a healthy work/life balance. Our core values contribute to increased productivity, employee retention and strong internal team support. This translates to the enhanced ability to delivery specialized solutions to our diverse customer base. Work Smarter, work safer, work Sandalwood!', '
', '
', '
', 'The successful candidate for Business Analyst will join a growing team of dedicated professionals helping our customers reduce their work-related risk to quality, productivity and employee health.', '
', '
CORE RESPONSIBILITIES', '
', '
', 'Facilitating current state business process reviews with client subject matter experts.', '
', 'Creating activity diagrams and use case documentation for current state business processes.', '
', 'Following all client standards and best practices for process mapping documentation.', '
', 'Continually looking for ways to improve efficiency through development of tools and methods.', '
', 'Utilizing good project management practices and ensuring clear communication to clients and management.', '
', 'Up to 50% travel to client sites across Canada and the United States.', '
', '
', 'Requirements', '
', 'A bachelor’s degree in business, engineering or related field or an MBA.', '
', 'A minimum of 3 years process mapping experience in an industrial environment (manufacturing, food & beverage, etc.)', '
', 'Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills.', '
', 'Strong facilitation skills.', '
', 'Excellent documentation skills including ability to capture detailed information quickly and accurately.', '
', 'Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations.', '
', 'Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, Visio and Outlook.', '
', 'Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills.', '
', 'A track record of following through on commitments.', '
', '
', 'Sandalwood is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', '
Benefits', '
', 'Health Care Plan (Medical, Dental & Vision)', '
', 'Retirement Plan (RRSP)', '
', 'Life Insurance (Basic, Voluntary & AD&D)', '
', 'Paid Time Off (Vacation & Public Holidays)', '
', 'Short Term & Long Term Disability', '
', 'Training & Development']

JOB DESCRIPTION: ['Attain Solutions is a leading provider of ERP applications and technology services. Based in Western Canada, our company provides the full spectrum of large scale business applications consulting to our public sector and government clients. Our mission is to provide cost-effective, sustainable solutions that realize the true value of enterprise applications.', 'Our Vancouver and Edmonton offices are looking for full-time permanent Business Systems Analysts to join our growing solutions delivery team.', 'As a Business Analyst you will demonstrate your expertise day to day in support, analysis, solutions delivery, and project work for PeopleSoft applications and other related ERP software. Your experience with different PeopleSoft modules and your deep understanding of related business processes will provide leadership and guidance to a number of clients.', 'We need people who are versatile in a number of different technologies, enjoy complex problem solving and have a strong sense of ownership and commitment to the end-user.', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Provide essential troubleshooting and support to end-users in a timely manner with a focus on an exceptional customer experience.', "Analyzing, interpreting and translating client's business requirements into viable solutions.", "Providing specialist advice on the design of the system from the client's business perspective.", 'Participating in the development of the criteria, scenarios, and scripts for system testing.', 'Coordinating user acceptance testing.', 'Clarifying functional requirements and resolving implementation issues.', 'Assisting application developers and technical support staff in identifying and resolving problems.', 'Prepare and conduct user training.', 'Serve as the organizational liaison with the user community.', 'Communicate and work directly with manager/team leads to estimate development complexity and timelines.', 'Desired Skills & Qualifications: ', 'Detailed knowledge of full cycle of the specific application and related business processes.', 'Previous experience with an ERP product (PeopleSoft preferred but not required).', 'A professional designation is a plus but not required.', 'Ability to balance multiple demands and work both independently and as part of a team.', 'Professionalism in dealing with all levels of management and staff both internally and externally.', 'Demonstrate a positive and professional attitude, personal integrity, strong problem solving ability and analytical skills.', 'Demonstrate organizational skills, high standards of accuracy, attention to detail and excellent follow-up skills.', 'Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Visio, Project) tools.', 'Ability to learn and assimilate information quickly.', 'Ability to break down business problems into logical tasks.', 'Ability to think creatively.', 'Ability to lead meetings.', 'Demonstrate ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, high volume, deadline-driven environment.', 'Exceptional service orientation, responsiveness and follow-through.', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Essentials: ', "We look for the same strand of DNA in all our employees: a curious self-starter that believes in a greater purpose. Someone that values integrity, honesty, and respect. Work is not just 8 hours set aside to earn dollars; you're on a mission for something greater. Whether it's to improve your family's life, or the community you live in, we value people that know the meaning of sowing into a vision. You help us achieve our vision and our clients' goals, and we help you live out yours.", 'Job Type: Full-time', 'Experience:', 'business analyst: 1 year (Preferred)']

JOB DESCRIPTION:
['We have a position available for a', ' Business Analyst ', 'in our IT department located in Regina.', '
', '
', '
The Business Analyst is responsible for creating and maintaining business process documents, creating test scripts and conducting initial testing. The Business Analyst is also responsible for coordinating end user tests and obtaining Business Process Sign Off for new and or changed business processes in the production system. Business Analysts work closely with Subject Matter Experts in various disciplines, IT staff and Project Managers. Travel may be required.', '
Required Skills', '
', '
Required Experience', '
', 'The ideal candidate will have 3 years of experience in a Business or System Analyst role. Excellent presentation, written and oral communication skills are required.
